infotexts.entitydescription.steroids: Temporarily increases muscular strength and physical performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.hyperzine: An extremely potent muscle stimulant for those moments when you gotta go fast.
infotexts.entitydescription.chloralhydrate: A sedative that can be used to knock someone out for a short period of time.
infotexts.entitydescription.nitroglycerin: A highly unstable liquid that may explode when subjected to heat or physical shock.
infotexts.entitydescription.fiberplant: This plant has the texture of a coconut and its fibers move on their own under your fingers unnervingly. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.elastinplant: The foliage of this plant cannot be torn, only stretched. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.aquaticpoppy: It's warm to the touch. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.yeastshroom: The smell is beyond belief, like rotting meat on a hot day. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.elastin: A highly elastic, naturally occurring protein. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.adrenaline: A naturally occurring hormone. Useful for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.antiparalysis: A cure for paralysis. Beware: Excessive use may cause psychosis.
infotexts.entitydescription.hallucinogenicbufotoxi: Hallucinogenic toxin secreted by some Europan species. Serves as an antiparalysant in a pinch.
infotexts.entitydescription.petegg: 一顆奇怪的蛋，試著對它注射生理鹽水。
infotexts.entitydescription.food: 滿身黏液寵物的最佳食品。
infotexts.entitydescription.swimbladder: Many Europan lifeforms have a swim bladder containing tissue fluids that can be easily processed into stabilozine and saline.
infotexts.entitydescription.adrenalinegland: Contains large amounts of adrenaline, which can be extracted using a deconstructor.
infotexts.entitydescription.suppliescabinet: Storage for small- and medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.mediumsteelcabinet: Storage for small- and medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.mediumwindowedsteelcab: Storage for small- and medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.steelcabinet: Storage for small- and medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.securesteelcabinet: Lockable storage for small- and medium-sized items.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshellrack: A way to neatly stow railgun shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.divingsuitlocker: A diving suit locker with one dive-ready suit.
infotexts.entitydescription.metalcrate: A vessel in which items may be stored.
infotexts.entitydescription.securemetalcrate: A secure vessel in which items may be stored.
infotexts.entitydescription.explosivecrate: A vessel in which explosives may be stored.
infotexts.entitydescription.chemicalcrate: A vessel in which chemicals may be stored.
infotexts.entitydescription.extinguisherbracket: Holds a fire extinguisher to the wall.
infotexts.entitydescription.weaponholder: A place to stow your weapons neatly.
infotexts.entitydescription.dockingport: A vertically aligned docking interface. Locks to another docking port to form a watertight seal and allow passage between subs, shuttles and locations.
infotexts.entitydescription.dockinghatch: A horizontally aligned docking interface. Locks to another docking hatch to form a watertight seal and allow passage between subs, shuttles and locations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ductblock: A mechanically operated vent that may be opened or closed to allow the passage of water.
infotexts.entityname.label: Label
infotexts.entitydescription.label: Decorative text label.
infotexts.entitydescription.fuelrod: A bar of enriched uranium, for use within a reactor.
infotexts.entitydescription.fulguriumfuelrod: A bar of enriched fulgurium, for use within a reactor. Generates significantly more heat and lasts longer than uranium fuel rods.
infotexts.entitydescription.thoriumfuelrod: A thorium bar, for use within a reactor. Generates slightly more heat and lasts longer than uranium fuel rods.
infotexts.entitydescription.depthchargeshell: A barrel of explosives. Will sink and then explode.
infotexts.entitydescription.nucleardepthcharge: A barrel of really big explosives. Will sink and then explode.
infotexts.entitydescription.depthdecoyshell: A decoy that can be deployed via the depth charge launcher. Will sink while producing a loud acoustic signal to attract attention away from the sub.
infotexts.entitydescription.nucleardepthdecoy: A decoy that can be deployed via the depth charge launcher. Will sink while producing a loud acoustic signal to attract attention away from the sub.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearshell: A nuclear shell for use with a railgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.mudraptoregg: A slimy, pulsating mudraptor egg. The gaping maw on top of the egg seems to be grasping for something to eat.
infotexts.entitydescription.loosevent: A place to stash things of dubious nature.
infotexts.entitydescription.loosepanel: A place to stash things of dubious nature.
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldterminal: A handheld device used for storing messages.
infotexts.entitydescription.idcardwreck: This ID card allows access to most of the wreck, provided the door isn't rusted shut.
infotexts.entitydescription.outpostterminal: 以此使用哨站的電子服務。
infotexts.entitydescription.sealedsupplycrate: 用來運送各種物資的箱子，A box of various in-demand supplies. Fetches a high price at outposts.
infotexts.entitydescription.scrap: A pile of possibly useful material.
infotexts.entitydescription.spinelingspike: A detached bone spike that once belonged to a Spineling.
infotexts.entitydescription.mediccrate: 用來運送醫療相關物品與原料的箱子。
infotexts.entitydescription.skyholderartifact: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalartifact: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.faradayartifact: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.nasonovartifact: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.psychosisartifact: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.alientrinket1: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.alientrinket2: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.alientrinket3: 在異星遺跡中被發現過的造物。
infotexts.entitydescription.alienhatch: A horizontal hatch for alien ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.aliendoor: A vertical door for alien ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.alienmotionsensor: A motion detector used by aliens.
infotexts.entitydescription.aliengenerator: Converts alien power cells to electricity.
infotexts.entitydescription.alienpump: Used to pump water in and out of ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.alienbutton: Sends a signal to alien mechanisms.
infotexts.entitydescription.alienturret: A stationary turret found in alien ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.aliencoil: Discharges electricity; used in alien ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.alienlightcomponent: Emits light; used in alien ruins.
infotexts.entitydescription.smallplanter: Suitable for most Europan plantlife while small enough to be transported around by hand.
infotexts.entitydescription.fertilizer: Carefully tended Europan soil guaranteed to give your plant the best living conditions.
infotexts.entitydescription.seedbag: Can store a wide variety of seeds.
infotexts.entitydescription.wateringcan: Keeps your plants happy and alive.
infotexts.entitydescription.creepingorange: A tasty fruit. Its processed juice has minor healing properties.
infotexts.entitydescription.tobaccobud: Damp and strongly fragrant. Can be refined into serviceable pipe tobacco.
infotexts.entitydescription.raptorbane: It looks delicious, but should not be ingested under any circumstances. Not good for mudraptors.
infotexts.entitydescription.raptorbaneextract: Concentrated raptorbane juice. Mildly toxic for humans, catastrophically toxic for mudraptors.
infotexts.entitydescription.pomegrenadeextract: Concentrated pomegrenade juice. It offers minor healing properties.
infotexts.entitydescription.pipetobacco: Put it in your pipe and smoke it.
infotexts.label.outpostinfodisplay1: 歡迎。氧氣: 正常。電力: 正常。輻射: 高於標準。本日天氣預報: 陰冷潮濕。
infotexts.label.dronedoor: 請在嘗試分離無人機前確保艙門已經關上
infotexts.autoloadout_description: Modify the quantity of items to be spawned on the sub initially
infotexts.submarine.description.humpback: 前軍艦WH4-L3“座頭鯨”已準備待命，它能對抗木衛二深處的大多數危險。該艦速度較高，但機動性差，舊型號的反應堆勉強能提供引擎所需的能源，如果你想安裝新設備，最好在艦上加裝一個備用蓄電池陣列。
infotexts.submarine.description.bunyip: 這艘船最初的設計目的是應用於客運，可以在潛艇與固定設施間快速轉移人員。為了保證速度與機動性，沼靈上未加裝武器，因此防禦力較弱。
infotexts.submarine.description.muikku: 作為木衛二殖民地的主力飛船，這種小型穿梭艇具有不錯的速度與良好的浮潛性能，另一方面，它們脆弱而“短腿” － 上面裝載的低容量蓄電池限制了它們的航程距離。
infotexts.submarine.description.orca: 三個大型壓載艙的激進設計使得該型號的潛艇有著令人驚異的最高航速與浮潛性能，如果你不考慮不穩定的發動機、消耗巨大的反應堆和過時的武器的話，逆戟鯨級潛艇是冰洋中的迅捷之王。
infotexts.submarine.description.remora: Remora有著較大的自由定制空間，主要船體結構包括一個可拆卸的壓載艙和一架遙控無人機，想要玩轉這艘潛艇，你需要雇傭大量人力。
infotexts.submarine.description.typhon: 颱風級潛艇外形粗獷、性能可靠、輕重火力兼備，不過，船長們都知道這種潛艇有著糟糕的極限航速與浮潛速度。
infotexts.submarine.description.dugong: 儒艮級潛艇有著最佳的性價比 － 雖然它各方面性能都稍遜一籌。缺乏火力與速度的問題只能靠靈活機動來彌補。
infotexts.submarine.description.selkie: 作為木衛二殖民地的主力穿梭艇，它具有不錯的速度與良好的浮潛性能，另一方面，它們脆弱而“短腿” － 上面裝載的低容量蓄電池限制了它們的航程距離。
infotexts.submarine.description.venture: 冒險級作為已被淘汰的科研飛船，目前常用於在哨站與潛艇之間的物資人員運輸。
infotexts.submarine.description.berilia: 海鞘級潛艇是木衛二最大的貨船之一，不過，想讓它正常運轉可不容易：就算有著不少船員，要維護兩部引擎和三個壓載艙的複雜供電體系也是一件難事。
infotexts.submarine.description.kastrull: 卡斯楚是一種可靠的進攻型潛艇，具有強大的火力。雖然不是很靈活，但是卻有無人炮艇的威力。它有著實驗性開放式壓載艙，低進水耐久和高組員數量要求，只有一隊經驗豐富的海員才能發揮此艦艇的最大實力。
infotexts.submarine.description.hemulen: 想與貧賤之人保持距離，在深海中有充足空間舒展身形嗎？希米倫是最佳的選項。
infotexts.submarine.description.typhon2: 颱風2型是聲名遠揚的提豐級潛艇的改進型號。座位重型炮艇，提豐2號潛航速度較慢，外形醜陋，但具備極強的生存能力。
infotexts.submarine.description.azimuth: 速度一流，設計時尚，艙內生活維持系統優越，這種潛艇是富有的老資格聯盟艦長們的最愛。
infotexts.submarine.description.r-29: R-29是一艘重型運輸潛艇，它的武備很難對付木衛二冰洋之下的怪物們，但作為替代，其上加裝了兩個強大的放電線圈。該艦船原設計者為rav2n。
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.humpback: 輸入on或off來接通或斷開蓄電池與電網的連結。輸入一個介於0-100區間內的數值來設定所有蓄電池的充電率。
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.typhon2: 輸入一個介於0-100之間的數值，來設定蓄電池陣列的充電率。
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.kastrulldiary1:
第一天，探險隊已經離開了融水，我們正穿越一條新發現的冰縫，意圖找到一條前往新莫斯科港的近路，這個任務不太安全，這次任務結束後我就可以退休了。

船長說，這次航程不會超過六天，據我估測，我們應該走到一半了，不過，也有可能這條冰縫是條死路，那樣的話我們就得折返了。

第四天，我不該那麼說的，我真是個烏鴉嘴，這條路果然是死胡同。

船長情緒低落，我也很失望。現在我們得原路返回來，要多花幾天時間才能回到出發地。

第八天，原來這裡有個洞，但現在無縫可過。冰山移動堵住了退路。我們開始廣播我們的位置，希望有人接收到信號來救我們。真該死。這本是我最後一次任務的。

第九天，食物與水開始定量分配了，船員的情緒不太妙。

第十一，或是十二天？沒人回應。能吃的東西不多了。水更少。我不想動筆了。

已經過去了三十多天了。已經沒有什麼好怕的了。我身邊都是屍體。人們倒在甲板上，眼珠微動，卻了無生機。
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.dugongtransmission:
重放上次發送的信號。
[2451-3-4 11:33] DG-35呼叫塔讓基地。有人嗎？
[2451-3-4 11:35]塔讓基地有人嗎？我們的上層甲板遭受重創！
[2451-3-4 11:35]那鬼東西太大了！
[2451-3-4 12:02]我們擊退了襲來的東西，但船體受損嚴重。收到消息的人請儘快來援。
[2451-3-4 12:06]喂喂？
infotexts.terminalwelcomemsg.traitorletter: 這封信是我的遺囑，也是我的自白書。我的任務是把這個聲呐探照燈偷偷帶上來，並在安全距離外打開它。它被設置為能夠吸引怪物的頻率。之前他們許諾會派一艘小船來接我，但此時無人來援。\n\n這是我最後一次接受這些大公司的所謂“研究任務”，希望他們同我一起下地獄。
infotexts.linkwaypoint: 按住空白鍵以連結至其他waypoint。
infotexts.idcarddescriptiontooltip: 從這個spawnpoint生成的角色的ID卡上將會加入這些描述。這能用來註記他們的ID卡在潛艇上的權限為何。
infotexts.idcardtagstooltip: 自這個spawinpoint生成的角色的ID卡上會被加入這些標籤。這些標籤能夠用以限制可進入空間的權限等等。
infotexts.spawnpointjobstooltip: 只有該職業的角色會從這個spawnpoint生成。
infotexts.spawnpointtagstooltip: Can be used to refer to the spawnpoint in events and human prefabs.
infotexts.reloadlinkedsubtooltip: 重新讀取自這個路徑置入的潛艇
infotexts.linklinkedsub: 按住空白鍵並點選對接艙口以將此潛艇與之連結
infotexts.spamfilterkicked: 你被垃圾訊息篩選器踢除了。
infotexts.spamfilterblocked: 你被垃圾訊息篩選器阻擋了。請在10秒後重試。
infotexts.reactortipfissionrate: 提高核分裂率將使反應爐消耗更多燃料並產生更多熱能。熱能將用以產生蒸氣推動渦輪，進而產生電力。
infotexts.reactortipturbineoutput: 渦輪的輸出目標愈高，反應爐就會嘗試產生更高的功率。但當輸出目標過高時，反應爐會因核分裂產生的熱量不足以推動渦輪而冷卻，反之輸出目標過低時則會使反應爐過熱。
infotexts.reactortiptemperature: 反應爐的核心溫度。當指針落在兩側紅色標示之間時為最佳溫度。
infotexts.reactortipload: 反應爐當前被消耗的電力。
infotexts.reactortippower: 反應爐當前產生的功率。
infotexts.reactortipautotemp: 自動控制開啟時，反應爐會依照負載自動調整輸出功率。但是這個系統無法在用電量大幅波動時及時做出反應，因此依舊有機會需要透過手動微調。
infotexts.steeringautopilotmaintainpostip: 自動駕駛開啟\n將潛艇維持在定點。在畫面中點選定點的位置。
infotexts.steeringautopilotlocationtip: 自動駕駛開啟\n已設定自動駕駛航行至 [locationname].
infotexts.sonartipactive: 當聲納為主動模式時，聲納會接收由發射器產生的能夠被周遭障礙物反射的聲波，這些聲波也能被具有侵略性的生物與敵方潛艇收到。
infotexts.sonartippassive: 當聲納為被動模式時，聲納只會在不自行產生聲波的狀態下接收其他聲源與被周遭障礙物反射的聲波。
infotexts.powertransfertipovervoltage: 電壓會在電網的電力供給大於消耗時上升，這可能會導致設備損壞。
infotexts.powertransfertiplowvoltage: 電壓會在電力供給不足時下降，這可能會導致部分設備停止運作。
infotexts.powertransfertipload: 目前電網上的設備正在消耗多少電力。
infotexts.powertransfertippower: 目前電網有多少電力供應。
infotexts.healthitemusetip: 將物品拖曳至所選的部位來使用。你也能以物品欄按鍵或者以滑鼠雙擊使用。
infotexts.lowmedicalskillwarning: 低醫療技能！列出的治療方式將不見得合適。
infotexts.healthlimbname.head: 頭部
infotexts.traitorstartmessage: 你扮演一名叛徒！你的祕密任務是暗殺[targetname]！保持低調是最重要的；可以的話，讓一切看起來像場意外，弄沉潛艇與殺害所有船員會引起艦隊的懷疑。
infotexts.traitormoreagentsmessage:
這艘潛艇上或許還有其他刺客，你不知道他們是誰，但你有與他們溝通的辦法：以暗號問候與回應他們，將這些詞句混入日常的談吐之間不讓其他船員起疑。

暗號是：[codewords]。
對應的回應則是：[coderesponse]。
infotexts.traitorendmessagesuccess: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，任務已被完成。
infotexts.traitorendmessagesuccesstraitordead: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，任務已被完成，但叛徒也失去了生命。
infotexts.traitorendmessagesuccesstraitordetained: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，任務已被完成，但叛徒被成功逮捕了。
infotexts.traitorendmessagefailure: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，任務失敗。
infotexts.traitorendmessagefailuretraitordead: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，但[genderpronoun]在完成[genderpronounreflexive]的任務之前被自己弄死了。
infotexts.traitorendmessagefailuretraitordetained: [traitorname]是名叛徒！[Genderpronounpossessive]的任務是暗殺[targetname]，任務失敗 － [genderpronoun]被成功逮捕了。
infotexts.traitorrespawnmessage: 你的叛徒任務失敗了。你不再是叛徒了，當個好人!
infotexts.traitortargetmessage: [traitorname]的秘密任務是將你暗殺 － 任務已被完成。
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.husk: 被寄生蟲佔據了你的身體。
infotexts.self_causeofdeathdescription.disconnecte: 你與伺服器的連結斷開了。
infotexts.giveinhelpmultiplayer: 放棄你的角色並進入觀戰模式 (其他玩家將無法為你復活)
infotexts.giveinhelpsingleplayer: 這個角色在放棄之後將無法被復活。
infotexts.deathchatnotification: 你的聊天訊息將只能被其他已死亡的玩家看到。
infotexts.dialogreactorfuel: 加入更多燃料至反應爐！
infotexts.dialogreactortaken: 手拿開！我自己就做得到！
嘿，反應爐只需要一個人操作！
infotexts.dialogleakfixed: 正在處理[roomname]，只剩幾個洞了
infotexts.dialognofire: 我認為沒有火災的危險！
infotexts.dialogsteeringtaken: 手拿開！我正在進行操縱！
infotexts.dialogsonartarget: 有一個光點在聲納上的[direction]！
infotexts.dialogsonartargetlarge: 聲納上有一個在[direction]的巨大目標！
聲納上有什麼龐然大物在[direction]！
infotexts.dialognorepairtargets: 什麼意思？東西都好好的呀。
infotexts.dialognopumps: 抽水機不是都好好的嗎？
目前沒有抽水機需要被照顧。
infotexts.dialognorescuetargets: 目前沒有人需要醫療幫助！
我認為現在沒有人需要醫療幫助。
infotexts.dialog.cantupgrade: 在你新買的潛艇送來之前我沒辦法對它做些什麼。
infotexts.dialog.upgradepurchased: 感謝你的購買！ 我會在你出發前著手動工。
infotexts.dialogenteroutpostwarning: 太近了，返回你們的潛艇否則我們要開火了。
這裡不歡迎你們，快點離開，不然你們只能被屍袋裝著離開。
infotexts.dialogstealwarning: 小偷！把它放回去我就裝作什麼都沒看到。
infotexts.dialogcannotfindrequireditemtorepair: 找不到用來進行維修的工具！
我沒有能夠進行維修的工具！
infotexts.dialogcannotfindfireextinguisher: 我需要什麼能用來滅火的東西！滅火器都跑到哪裡去了？
infotexts.dialogcannotfindweldingequipment: 焊接工具跑到哪裡去了？我什麼都找不到！
焊接工具啊焊接工具... 我最需要你的時候你去了哪裡？
infotexts.dialogdamagewallswarning: 你是不是瘋了？快住手，你會讓整個地方淹沒！
infotexts.dialogunidentifiedtargetspotted: 我找到了一個新的目標！我不太確定它是什麼...
infotexts.dialognewtargetspotted: 我找到了一個新的目標！
infotexts.dialogcannottreatpatient: 抱歉，我對[name]什麼都沒辦法做！
infotexts.orderdialogself.rescue: 我來為需要的人提供醫療支援！
infotexts.orderdialog.repairsystems.all: [name]，為故障設備進行維修！我不在乎你的技術好不好 － 盡你所能!
[name]，試著修好故障的設備，就算你受過的訓練跟這無關！
[name]，去把故障的設備修好！怎麼修都行 － 我現在不在乎你只受過什麼訓練！
infotexts.orderoptions.steer: 維持定點, 返航, 前進
infotexts.orderdialog.unignorethis: 喚起你對[roomname]中目標的注意力！
infotexts.orderdialog.reportballastflora: 有什麼異星東西在[roomname]裡生長。
我在[roomname]裡看到一些又怪又噁的植物。
我們應該要想辦法把長在[roomname]裡的東西處理掉！
infotexts.huskdormant: 你感覺身體像發燒一樣
你覺得有什麼東西卡在喉嚨裡
infotexts.huskcantspeak: 你感覺喉嚨裡有什麼東西在蠕動，你試著大叫卻發不出聲音。
infotexts.huskactivate: 一條幾丁質觸手從你的嘴裡伸了出來，以[Attack]將卵注入其他鮮活的肉體中！
infotexts.doormsgcannotopen: 這扇門由與之連接的按鈕或遠端控制器控制。
infotexts.itemmsgpaintorcleaningagentrequired: 需要放入油漆或清潔劑
infotexts.afflictiondescription.internaldamage: 有血管與臟器受損的跡象。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bleeding: 血液從一處嚴重的開放性傷口湧出。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.burn: 患部起泡發紅，表皮也已經開始剝落，傷者正承受劇痛。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.oxygenlow: 皮膚蒼白潮濕，且嘴唇發青。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bloodloss: 患者蒼白體溫冰冷，心跳以反常的高速率跳動。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stun: 患者頭暈目眩，反應遲鈍。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressure: 有明顯的嚴重臟器創傷且眼部的血管破裂造成了令人不安的紅色目光。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskinfection: Something dark and unpleasant moves in the mouth. They are rendered completely mute, save for occasional clicking sounds apparently emanating from deep within the throat.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.huskinfection: 你被畫皮寄生蟲完全控制了。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.psychosis: 患者激動地胡言亂語，娓娓描述著不存在的事物。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.drunk: The smell of alcohol rises from them like a vapor, their speech slurs a little, and their eyes fail to focus.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.opiatewithdrawal: Agitation and a tremor are obvious, as are the signs of nausea.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.opiatewithdra: 你死於鴉片類藥物戒斷。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.opiateoverdose: The patient has pinpoint pupils and icy cold skin. They struggle to breathe and swallow.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.opiateaddiction: 患者看起來心情不錯...只要他們拿到他們想要的。
infotexts.afflictiondescription.gunshotwound: The entry site is a small, dark, bruised hole oozing a little blood. The exit wound, however, is a large ragged mess of exposed tissue, and it's pouring blood.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.gunshotwound: You have died of gunshot wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.morbusinepoisoning: The patient can't breathe at all, and their heart rate is slowing rapidly.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.morbusinepois: You have died of morbusine poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.sufforinpoisoning: Without prompt treatment, sufforine poisoning leads to delusions and rapid death.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.sufforinpoiso: You have died of sufforin poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.cyanidepoisoning: The patient is confused and has trouble breathing. Their skin is red and they have occasional muscle spasms.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.cyanidepoison: You have died of cyanide poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.blunttrauma: The area is an ugly shade of purple, and apparently very painful to touch. You suspect a bone might be broken.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.blunttrauma: You have succumbed to injuries from blunt force trauma.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.lacerations: The skin is pierced and there are deep, bleeding wounds.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.lacerations: You have succumbed to your wounds.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bitewounds: There is extensive damage to soft tissue in the area and there are asymmetrical, bleeding wounds.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.bitewounds: You have been mauled to death.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.radiationsickness: The patient's skin is red and blistering.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.deliriuminepoisoni: The patient seems agitated, with small but noticeable nervous twitches in their face and hands.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.organdamage: The patient is suffering from sharp pain in their internal organs. There is no visible damage to the epidermis.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.organdamage: Perished as a result of internal organ failure.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.organdamage: You have perished as a result of internal organ failure.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.explosiondamage: The area is colored purple. The tissue underneath feels different than the surrounding skin.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.explosiondama: You have succumbed to your deep tissue injuries.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.nausea: The skin is clammy and the patient is vomiting periodically.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.nausea: You have choked on your own vomit.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.watchersgaze: Seeming confused and slightly terrified, the patient doesn't look good. Could it be a mental breakdown? A stress reaction? There's not much you can do about it.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeath.watchersgaze: Stared to death by a Watcher.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.watchersgaze: Stared to death by a Watcher.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.reaperstax: The patient is tormented by painful visions of death and rebirth. Memories of past lives or just a stress reaction...? Consulting a medical doctor at an outpost is advised.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.concussion: The patient seems disoriented and has trouble focusing their eyes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.haste: Movement speed and reflexes are heightened.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskinfectionresis: Patient's immune system is more attuned to alien parasites.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressureresistance: Internal organs are more accustomed to high pressures.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.paralysisresistanc: The patient's body is less affected by paralysis. It also seems to recover from any existing effects.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.increasedswimmings: Oxygen flows more freely into the subject's limbs, resulting in greater swimming speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.naturalmeleeweapon: A sharp beak is protruding from the subject's forehead.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.naturalrangedweapo: Sharp spikes are growing from the subject's back.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.damageresistance: Subject's skin is hardened and more resistant to damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.decreasedoxygencon: Subject's lung capacity is grown, resulting in more efficient oxygen consumption.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.increasedwalkingsp: Subject's bone structure is lighter, resulting in greater walking and running speed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.increasedmeleedama: Subject has gained muscle mass, resulting in greater strength.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.healdamage: Subject's wounds are healed at an accelerated rate.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.vigorondamage: Subject's pain receptors are numbed in response to physical trauma.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hyperactivityondam: Subject's reflexes are heightened in response to physical trauma.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.increasedmeleedama: Subject's adrenaline level is heightened in response to physical trauma.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.husktransformimmun: Subject has gained a heightened tolerance for the husk parasite.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tunnelvision: Subject's eyes are sensitive to light.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.rigidjoints: Subject's joints are stiff and moving is more difficult.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.hypersensitivity: Subject's skin is sore and more sensitive to touch.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.xenobiology: Subject's organs are resistant to traditional medicine.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.outsideinfluence: Subject hears unintelligible voices inside their head.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.glassjaw: Subject suffers from longer periods of unconsciousness when knocked out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.musculardystrophy: Subject suffers from decreased muscle mass.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.inflamedlung: Subject has an adverse reaction to oxygen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.regeneration: The subject is slowly regaining their vitality.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.repairflow: The subject is in the flow, and able to repair devices effortlessly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.evasivemaneuvers: The subject has momentarily become a much better captain.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.stonewall: The subject has become sturdier and resistant to stuns.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.clownpower: Only by wearing the mask is the true self revealed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.soothingsounds: The sounds of clownery have a healing effect on the subject.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.inspiringtunes: The subject's skills are momentarily increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tandemfire: The subject is gaining combat effectiveness from being near an inspiring ally.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tumbling: The subject's effectiveness with pistols is increased.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.quickdrawing: The subject is prepared to draw.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.dashing: The subject is moving forward, quickly.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.inspiredtoact: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become stalwart and able!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.welldrilled: The subject, ordered by their captain, has become better at ship repairs and maintenance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.battleready: The subject, ordered by their captain, is now a much better warrior.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.downwiththeship: The subject refuses to abandon ship, and will do anything to restore it to its former glory.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.powerattack: The subject is about to unleash a powerful attack.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pickinguptheslack: The subject feels they must work a bit harder to make up for someone else.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pyromania: The subject is enjoying the smell of searing flesh a bit too much.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.tinkerexhaustion: The subject can't tinker with any more devices for the time being.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.bedsidemanner: The subject is gaining physical damage reduction and is learning faster.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.guarded: The subject is prepared for the next attack on them.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.skillfulmelodies: The subject has become better at learning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.chemaddiction: The patient has grown dependent on performance-boosting drugs.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.chemwithdrawal: The patient sweats and twitches a lot, likely craving their next fix.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.pressurestabilized: The subject is immune to pressure and has no need for oxygen at this time.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.endocrineboost: The subject has gained heightened capabilities, permanently.
infotexts.jobdescription.captain: 負責指揮全體船員並確保一切動作都能順利執行。
infotexts.jobdescription.engineer: 工程師是潛艇的支柱，他們的電學知識與技師的機械知識互補，能夠對船上的各項電氣設備進行維護。
infotexts.jobdescription.mechanic: 技師們能夠憑著機械知識修好各項機械設備，他們與工程師搭配以確保潛艇能夠全力運轉。
infotexts.jobdescription.securityofficer: 安全官們負責保護潛艇受到威脅，不論他們來自艙內貨艙外；不只要當心水中的生物，船上不時也會遭到反對木衛二聯盟的叛亂組織滲透。
infotexts.jobdescription.medicaldoctor: 儘管醫生們有著替受傷或失去意識的船員的相關技能常被視為理所當然，他們是潛艇上的重要人物，這些技能也能在製作非醫療化學物時展現優勢。
infotexts.jobdescription.assistant: 助手們沒有特定的職責或專業，對於想要熟悉潛艇上的作業但對職務內容不瞭解的新人來說是一個不錯的選擇。
infotexts.jobdescription.captain1: 一位來自歐羅巴大海的老水手，這位艦長能被船員們尊敬，或者強迫船員們尊敬他。
infotexts.jobdescription.captain2: 叛逆者們是當權者的眼中釘，他們以激進且具侵略性的行動萊打亂聯盟中的脆弱平衡。
infotexts.jobdescription.captain3: 隸屬於聯盟的艦長遵循一系列艱澀的規定，但這並沒有扼殺他們與敵方打交道時展現的創意。
infotexts.jobdescription.engineer1: 原子工程師負責管理潛艇上的反應爐，職業危害要求他們佩戴一些防輻射防護裝備。
infotexts.jobdescription.engineer2: 潛艇上錯綜複雜的電力系統需要不間斷的維護，更換保險絲、為設備接通電源、以及遭受無數次電擊的可疑榮譽落到了工程師們的肩上。
infotexts.jobdescription.mechanic1: 一位技師在木衛二上的主要工作是在船艙出現漏洞時把它們補好，這些人被訓練來維持船體與設備的正常運作。
infotexts.jobdescription.mechanic2: A mechanic variant that specializes in making art (and supplies) out of crude materials.
infotexts.jobdescription.securityofficer1: 突擊隊員 are a special breed of security officer. They only have a single purpose: destroy the enemy, whether it's at range or mano a mano.
infotexts.jobdescription.securityofficer2: 安全官們are dedicated to keeping the peace at any cost. Preferably but not necessarily using non-lethal force.
infotexts.jobdescription.securityofficer3: 潛艇砲手 are trained not only to shoot accurately with coil and railguns but also to keep them in working condition.
infotexts.jobdescription.medicaldoctor1: Administering first aid often requires venturing into dangerous areas. These front-line medics have gear that offers them some protection against monsters and guns, while not compromising their mobility.
infotexts.jobdescription.medicaldoctor2: These doctors are prepared to treat most, if not all, injuries that threaten the crew on lengthy trips underwater.
infotexts.locationchange.none.changeto.outpost: 一群移民抵達了[previousname]並在那裡建立了一個新的哨站。
infotexts.locationchange.none.changeto.military: 一座新的軍事哨站被建立在[previousname]。
infotexts.locationchange.none.changeto.research: 一座新的研究哨站被建立在[previousname]。
infotexts.locationchange.lair.changeto.none: [previousname]已經不再是怪物的巢穴且成為了一處安全的殖民地點。
infotexts.locationchange.ruins.changeto.outpost: 一座新的哨站被建立在[previousname]。
infotexts.locationchange.ruins.changeto.military: 一座新的軍事哨站被建立在[previousname]。
infotexts.locationchange.ruins.changeto.research: 一座新的研究哨站被建立在[previousname]。
infotexts.locationchange.outpost.changeto.military: 一個聯盟勢力抵達了[previousname]並在該地區拓展軍事力量。
infotexts.locationchange.outpost.changeto.research: 一批研究人員將[previousname]改為研究站並開始研究周遭的生物群。
infotexts.locationchange.military.changeto.city: [previousname]的指揮官被任命為治理階層，使得[name]現在成為了一座正式的城市。
infotexts.locationchange.research.changeto.city: [previousname]的研究實驗室吸引了更多移民，使得它現在變成了[name]。
infotexts.locationchange.mine.changeto.city: [previousname]的礦工親屬移入使得它變成了一座像樣的城市。
infotexts.tutorial.tryagain: Do you want to try again?
infotexts.tutorial.radio.speaker: Captain Huskinson
infotexts.tutorialskipwarning: It looks like this might be the first time you've played Barotrauma. We strongly recommend that you give the tutorials a try before starting your journey through the depths of Europa.
infotexts.tutorial.mechanictitle: Mechanic - Glue, duct tape and your nerve are the only things keeping the crew alive.
infotexts.tutorial.mechanicdescription: When the plan goes as planned and the gear works is as probable as the human race leaving this shithole. There are no breaks or rest for you, as everything that can break down, will break down. And if nothing’s broken, then it's maintenance, maintenance, maintenance. Getting to the next destination is all that matters, and you’re the one who delivers. There’s no thank-yous or respect, just snickering and contempt from your "fellow crew members"—but that’s okay. This is YOUR survival vessel, and if any of them make it too, well...whoop dee doo for them.
infotexts.tutorial.engineertitle: Engineer - The one who harnesses the power of nature.
infotexts.tutorial.engineerdescription: Power and oxygen, it's like that. Without, the ship don’t move and the lungs won’t breathe. Beyond the fancy talk and costume play, you are the guy who really runs the ship, get it? Trust in the laws of physics and think clear. Also, keep your eye on that damn toy-tinkering wannabe engineer mechanic, and whatever you do, don’t bite into the psycho-babble of the medic. He’s so deep in his softie inner world he’s practically a woman. Captain and security are harmless, and way below your intelligence. Obviously.
infotexts.tutorial.securityofficertitle: Security Officer - The backbone of violence.
infotexts.tutorial.securityofficerdescription: It is said that pressure brings out the worst in people. Not everybody has your moral strength—hell, most of them are so crooked that it’s questionable if they even should be allowed to live. Channel the crew’s anger toward the creatures outside, but never fool yourself into trusting them. Keep the nukes ready, the handcuffs available, and every now and then put someone in the brig just so they know who’s in charge!
infotexts.tutorial.medicaldoctortitle: Medical Doctor - Maintaining the key resource: the people
infotexts.tutorial.medicaldoctordescription: Guns and engines and reactors don't keep the ship running—people do. It’s up to you to keep the gunner alive to man the guns and captain alive to steer the ship. And remember, your job goes well beyond the physical. We live crammed into tight spaces, under ice, in the sea. When the lights go out and your "buddies" go to sleep, all kinds of dark shit crawls into their minds. Keep them alive and sane, or put them down like dogs. It’s up to you.
infotexts.tutorial.captaintitle: Captain - Naval visionary, seafarer, a genius. Possibly.
infotexts.tutorial.captaindescription: Captain Ahab once said, "Hell is an idea first born on an undigested apple-dumpling." Do you know what that means? No. Does the crew think you are a mysterious genius? Hell yeah. This job is at least as much appearing to know what to do as actually knowing what to do. You are the map and the compass, the guy with the big picture. Navigate and make the tough calls. And remember, you’re just a few steps away from being the mayor of an outpost, and if a couple fellows need to die for that—so be it!
infotexts.tutorial.airlockdescription:
Every submarine should be equipped with a secure airlock where the crew can exit the sub safely and without too much flooding.

To safely exit the submarine, equip a diving suit and other necessary items (usually a handheld sonar, weapons and extra oxygen tank or two). Then make your way to the airlock. Be sure to close all the doors behind you to stop the water’s flow before too much of it gets inside.

When coming back inside, use water pumps to drain all of the water before going deeper into the submarine. It is also helpful to return all of the equipment back to their proper places and refill used oxygen tanks at the oxygen generator.
infotexts.tutorial.railgundescription: The railgun works like a coil gun, except it fires big shells that can be upgraded with explosives.\n\nRailgun loaders are loaded with single railgun shells instead of boxes of ammunition. Otherwise, operating them is the same: interact with the periscope to aim with the turret, then press {0} to fire. Press {1} to stop aiming.
infotexts.tutorial.syringegundescription: A ranged weapon of choice for medics, the syringe gun uses medicine as ammunition. This allows for administering cures from afar. Be aware: medicines fired from long range are less effective than those used in the medical interface.\n\nA tactical choice in combat would be to load the syringe gun with poison and fire it at enemies. Aim the syringe gun the same way you would other long-range weapons: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.
infotexts.tutorial.plasmacutterdescription: The plasma cutter is a device used to cut through walls and doors. It functions like the welding tool: {0} to aim, {1} to fire.\n\nWhile the plasma cutter is primarily a tool, it does inflict burns on anyone who gets in the way, which makes it a handy makeshift weapon.
infotexts.tutorial.crowbardescription: A heavy instrument that can be used to force open doors. Handy when someone has been tampering with door wiring or when you need to get to rooms you’re not allowed in. Use ({0}) the crowbar on a closed door to start prying it open. The crowbar must be equipped to do this.
infotexts.tutorial.mineralsdescription: The basic materials for crafting can be bought, deconstructed or found in the world.\n\nMinerals are spawned in the cave and ice walls, and they can be cut out using the plasma cutter and then picked up. Raw minerals can be deconstructed to create craftable elements.
infotexts.tutorial.psychosisdescription: When in contact with certain performance-enhancing drugs or under some extraterrestrial influence, players may be afflicted with psychosis, causing them to experience visual and auditory hallucinations and phantom pains.\n\nPsychosis may be cured using haloperidol.
infotexts.tutorial.opiatesdescription: Overuse of pain medication causes addiction and, in time, withdrawal. Withdrawal symptoms can be reduced by feeding the addiction, but to truly be rid of the effects, one must either stop taking the drugs entirely or use naloxone.
infotexts.tutorial.oxygendescription: Oxygen is a valuable commodity in underwater Europa. It must be readily available during long transits aboard submarines, which is made possible by oxygen generators. They pump air through ventilation to different rooms and can be used to refill oxygen tanks.\n\nTo refill oxygen tanks, interact ([InteractType.Use]) with the generator to open its inventory. Insert an empty oxygen tank into one of the slots to start refilling it. When the tank is full, drag it back to your inventory or into your diving suit/mask.
infotexts.tutorial.ladderdescription: To grab onto a ladder, press {0}. Use {1} and {2} buttons to climb the ladder. Let go of the ladder by pressing {3} again.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.wakeup: Are you okay? You need to get up and moving. Get to the sub ASAP!
infotexts.mechanic.radio.equipment: Remember to get your gear from the locker. Grab everything you can carry. We’re in for some rough shit.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.breach: Hey, I’m reading some hull breaches along your way. Better plug those real quick to buy us some time.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.news: All right, can you hear me? I got bad news and good news.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.fire: The bad news is there’s a fire ahead. The good news is there’s probably enough scrap nearby for you to make a fire extinguisher.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.diving: You’re almost there. Just be careful—this next leak is large enough for the whole room to be pressurized. Find a diving suit or the pressure will kill you.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.submarine: Welcome aboard. First thing you need to do is to check the engine and ballast pumps, see if they’re in need of maintenance.
infotexts.mechanic.radio.complete: Well done. Let’s wait for the others to make their way here. Can’t very well operate the sub with just the two of us.
infotexts.mechanic.opendoortext: Move by pressing {0}, {1}, {2}, {3} buttons. Interact with items and devices with {4} button.
infotexts.mechanic.equipmentobjective: Get your equipment from the locker
infotexts.mechanic.equipmenttext:
Interact with containers by pressing ({0}). Transfer items between the container and your inventory by dragging or double-clicking.

Equip items by double-clicking on them or by pressing the corresponding quick-slot key.

To close the window, press {1}.
infotexts.mechanic.weldingtext:
Equip your welding tool and diving mask by double-clicking on them. 

Use the welding tool to repair leaks in hulls. The diving mask will provide you with oxygen while underwater. 

When a welding tool is equipped, hold {0} to aim. While aiming, hold {1} to weld.
infotexts.mechanic.drainobjective: Turn on the pump to drain excess water
infotexts.mechanic.draintext: Turn the nearby pump on by interacting with it ({0}) and then hit the big red button.
infotexts.mechanic.deconstructtext:
The fabricator is a device that can take different kinds of materials and turn them into useful items.

Materials can be found, bought or obtained from breaking down other items with a deconstructor. 

To create a fire extinguisher, you need aluminum and sodium. Sodium is readily available, but aluminum must be deconstructed from oxygen tanks.
infotexts.mechanic.fabricatetext: Now we can create a fire extinguisher with a fabricator. Find it in the list of recipes and press the ‘CREATE’ button to start fabricating.\n\nWhen finished, the item will be found in the fabricator’s output slot. Take the extinguisher by double-clicking on it.
infotexts.mechanic.extinguishertext: Use the fire extinguisher like you would a welding tool. Aim by holding down {0} and press {1} to dispense.
infotexts.mechanic.dropextinguishertext: Some items are too large to carry around in your inventory. To unequip the fire extinguisher, drag it away from the inventory and release the mouse button.
infotexts.mechanic.divingtext: A diving suit protects the wearer from high pressure. Equip one to be able to swim outside the submarine and in other high-pressure environments. Check the oxygen indicator under the diving suit icon to see how much oxygen you have left in your suit's tank, and remember to replace the oxygen tank when it's empty.
infotexts.mechanic.repairpumptext: Devices require maintenance or they'll stop working. Mechanical devices take a wrench to repair. Equip a wrench and interact ({0}) with a device to repair it.\n\nItems in need of maintenance are marked with a repair icon.
infotexts.mechanic.repairsubmarineobjective: Repair the engine and ballast pumps
infotexts.mechanic.repairsubmarinetext: Find the engine (usually located in the rear compartment of a submarine) and ballast pumps (at the bottom; note that some submarines have multiple ballast tanks).
infotexts.engineer.radio.wakeup: Get your ass up! We need power!
infotexts.engineer.radio.equipment: That last impact cut power to half of the outpost. I want you to grab what you need to get us online again.
infotexts.engineer.radio.reactorstable: We seem to be stable now. Some junction boxes blew their fuses and pumps aren’t working—you should go see what you can do about it. Remember to switch the reactor to automatic before you go.
infotexts.engineer.radio.faultywiring: Some of the wiring seems to be faulty. Find some wire and do a quick fix, otherwise we’re without power.
infotexts.engineer.radio.changeofplans: Change of plans. Come to the sub. We’re gonna blow this joint.
infotexts.engineer.radio.submarine: Looks like the electrical room’s seen better days. See if you can get it online, then power up the reactor.
infotexts.engineer.radio.complete: Good work. We may yet make it out of this alive.
infotexts.engineer.equipmenttext:
Items are stored in containers of different sizes. You can see what’s inside one by interacting with it ({0}). Transfer items between character and container inventory by dragging or double-clicking.

When in a character’s inventory, items can be equipped by double-clicking on them or by pressing the corresponding quick-slot key.

To close the interface, press {1}.
infotexts.engineer.reactorobjective: Insert a fuel rod into the reactor
infotexts.engineer.reactortext: Submarines and outposts are powered by nuclear reactors, which consume fuel. Place a fuel rod in the item slot on the left side of the reactor interface.\n\nMultiple fuel rods create more heat, but in normal circumstances one is enough and any more might cause the reactor to overheat.
infotexts.engineer.operatereactortext: Set the fission rate so that the needle is on green, then do the same for turbine output. Try to keep the output as close to load as possible to avoid power outages or overheating.\n\nThe power grid load fluctuates, so keep an eye on the reactor load and output and react to any changes.
infotexts.engineer.repairjunctionboxtext: Like mechanical items, junction boxes need maintenance. In addition to wear and tear, they are damaged by water and overvoltage.\n\nElectrical devices are repaired with a screwdriver. Equip one and interact ({0}) with the device to see the repair interface.
infotexts.engineer.wirejunctionboxestext: Junction boxes connect the submarine’s devices to the power grid through wires.\n\nEquip a screwdriver and wire, then interact with ({0}) the item you want to add to the power grid. Drag the wire to the “power” pin, then press {1} to close the panel. Repeat the step at the next device.
infotexts.engineer.repairelectricalroomtext: Find the sub’s electrical room and repair the junction boxes by interacting with them while holding a screwdriver, then pressing the “Repair” button.
infotexts.engineer.powerupreactortext:
Nuclear reactors provide power to submarines and outposts. They require fuel to create heat and a crew member to regulate the output.

Drag a fuel rod to the item slot on the left side. Multiple fuel rods create more heat, but in normal circumstances one is enough and any more might cause the reactor to overheat.

Start by setting the fission rate so that the needle is on green, then do the same for turbine output. You can see load and output values to the right. Try to keep the output as close to load as possible; a lower output can lead to power outages, and higher to overvoltage and fires.

When the reactor operator leaves the interface, consider turning on automatic control. With automatic control, the reactor responds to any fluctuations in grid load, but it is considerably slower than a human operator.
infotexts.officer.radio.wakeup: Is there any security still alive? We have a hull breach and some unwanted visitors!
infotexts.officer.radio.equipment: Find what you need to take out these monsters.
infotexts.officer.radio.crawlerdead: Good job, but that was just a baby crawler. I see something bigger up ahead, so keep on your toes.
infotexts.officer.radio.somethingbig: I’m reading something big on the sonar. Load the coilgun and see if you can take it down.
infotexts.officer.radio.hammerheaddead: Nice shooting. Bad news is, this station is unsalvageable. Come down to the sub—we’re leaving before it’s too late.
infotexts.officer.radio.submarine: Welcome aboard. I need you to make sure we’re ready to deal with whatever comes after us when we leave. Start inspecting the weaponry.
infotexts.officer.radio.complete: Outstanding. Now get ready. Once the rest of the crew arrives, we’re out of here.
infotexts.officer.equipmenttext:
Items are stored in containers of different sizes. You can see what’s inside one by interacting with it ({0}). Transfer items between character and container inventory by dragging or double-clicking.

When in a character’s inventory, items can be equipped by double-clicking on them or by pressing the corresponding quick-slot key.

To close the interface, press {1}.
infotexts.officer.meleeweaponobjective: Equip a melee weapon and protective gear
infotexts.officer.meleeweapontext: Equip a weapon and body armor by double-clicking it in your inventory. Weapons require at least one free hand.\n\nReady the weapon by holding {0} and swing it by clicking {1}.
infotexts.officer.crawlertext: Take down the crawler in the next room using the stun baton.
infotexts.officer.somethingbigobjective: Load coilgun and turn on the supercapacitor
infotexts.officer.somethingbigtext:
Coilguns are standard-issue equipment in most subs. They require short bursts of power and boxes of ammunition.

To ready the coilgun, set the supercapacitor's recharge rate (50% is usually enough), then insert full ammunition boxes into the coilgun loader.

Unload empty ammunition boxes from loaders by dragging the empty boxes away from the loader.
infotexts.officer.hammerheadtext: To fire the coilgun, interact ({0}) with the periscope. While on the periscope, aim with the mouse and fire by pressing {1}. To stop aiming, press {2}.\n\nThe gun uses a lot of power, so fire conservatively or the supercapacitor may not be able to keep up.
infotexts.officer.rangedweapontext: Ranged weapons work the same way as melee weapons, except their accuracy is dependent on your weapons skill. Aim with {0} and fire with {1}.\n\nRanged weapons must also be loaded with ammunition. Hover the mouse cursor over a weapon to see how much ammunition it has. Drop ammunition into the ammo slots or on the weapon itself to load the weapon.
infotexts.officer.mudraptortext: Mudraptors are bigger, meaner and more armored than crawlers. Taking them down requires more firepower. Aim for the mouth or belly and try to keep your distance.
infotexts.officer.armsubmarinetext: Find ammunition for the coilguns and load them. Recharge supercapacitors.
infotexts.doctor.radio.knockeddown: That was a big one. Are you okay? Get yourself patched up, fast. We need a medic here stat.
infotexts.doctor.radio.assistantburns: They’ve got a nasty burn. You don’t have any bandages with you, do you? Get them to follow you while you go find some.
infotexts.doctor.radio.assistantburnshealed: I guess that’ll do. Make your way to the sub; it’s too dangerous to stay here.
infotexts.doctor.radio.enteredsub: Good. Everyone’s here. Check up on everybody while we get the vessel ready for transit.
infotexts.doctor.suppliestext:
Items are stored in containers of different sizes. You can see what’s inside one by interacting with it ({0}). Transfer items between character and container inventory by dragging or double-clicking.

When in a character’s inventory, items can be equipped by double-clicking on them or by pressing the corresponding quick-slot key.

To close the interface, press {1}.
infotexts.doctor.openmedicalinterfacetext: Press {0} to enter the medical interface.
infotexts.doctor.firstaidselftext: Afflictions affecting you are shown in the list to the right. Some afflictions are local to specific limbs. Inspect different limbs by clicking on them.\n\nTo treat an affliction, drop the medical item you want to use on the affected limb. You have some light internal damage. Use morphine to treat your internal damage now.
infotexts.doctor.medbayobjective: Take the crew member to the med bay
infotexts.doctor.medbaytext: Get the patient to follow you to the med bay.\n\nPress {0} to open the command wheel. Click on "Movement", "Follow", and then select the character you want to issue the command to.
infotexts.doctor.treatburnstext:
Treat others by highlighting the target and pressing {0}.

Double-click an item in the medical interface to administer it to the patient. 

Bandages heal burns quickly. Find them in the highlighted cabinet.
infotexts.doctor.cprtext: When characters suffer too many injuries, they become unconscious. In this state, their oxygen level falls constantly and when it gets to zero, they die. They can be resuscitated through CPR.\n\nResuscitate the patient by entering their medical interface (by hovering over their character and pressing {0}) and clicking the green “resuscitate” button. The process may take a while, depending on your medical skill.
infotexts.doctor.submarineobjective: Give medical assistance to everyone who needs it
infotexts.doctor.submarinetext:
Inspect each patient by pressing {0}, then administer the correct treatment. Remember to check each limb by selecting them in the medical interface.

Medical supplies are often found in the med bay or storage, along with some basic meds in the supply cabinets scattered throughout the sub. Check each medical item’s description to see what they treat.

Equip the Health Scanner HUD to see who is injured and how.
infotexts.captain.radio.complete: Glad you made it out of there. Welcome to [OUTPOSTNAME].
infotexts.captain.commandmedictext: Press {0}, then order the medic to follow you ("Movement", then "Follow").
infotexts.captain.commandmechanicobjective: Order the mechanic to perform maintenance
infotexts.captain.commandmechanictext:
When ordered to perform maintenance ("Maintenance", then "Repair Mechanical Systems"), the character will patrol and search for any mechanical items in need of repair.

When assigning tasks, note that you can press either the Left mouse button to automatically choose the assignee, or the Right mouse button to select a crewmember for the job. In this case, assign the mechanic.

You'll notice the character's current task being displayed in the crew list in the upper left corner. If you want to dismiss a character from the task, click on the task icon.
infotexts.captain.commandsecurityobjective: Order the security to man guns
infotexts.captain.commandsecuritytext: To order somebody to man guns, click on the “Operate Weapons” button in the command wheel. Then choose the weapon you want them to operate.\n\nSecurity officers are usually the most adept at operating guns.
infotexts.captain.commandengineerobjective: Order the engineer to power up the reactor
infotexts.captain.commandengineertext: To order somebody to operate the reactor, open the command interface and choose "Operate", then “Operate Reactor”, then “Power up”. The character will then tend to the reactor until dismissed.\n\nAssign an engineer to power up the reactor.
infotexts.captain.undocktext: To get moving, you need to undock the submarine from the outpost. Do this by going into the navigation console and pressing the “Undock” button.
infotexts.captain.navigatetext:
Plot a course for the submarine by clicking on the sonar display.

To see where the sub is heading, turn on active sonar in the sonar settings next to the display.

Move carefully. The faster the submarine moves, the more difficult it will be to slow it down. Colliding with cave walls will damage the hull and cause leaks. For tutorial purposes, this sub will be protected against hull breaches.
infotexts.captain.docktext:
To dock the submarine, maneuver the ship’s and outpost’s docking ports close to each other and toggle the docking clamps. Ports are displayed in green on the sonar display.

When the ports are close to each other, a line will be shown on the sonar display. When the line is fully green, close the clamps by pressing the “Dock” button. The submarine will then be locked into position until undocked.

When positioning the submarine for docking, radical movements can easily cause you to overshoot your target. Using autopilot and “maintain position” is helpful in setting the position you want the submarine to move to.
infotexts.karmaexplanation: Karma reflects the helpful and harmful actions you've taken while playing. Actions such as repairing the submarine, operating devices and killing monsters increase Karma, while actions such as attacking members of your crew or damaging the submarine decrease it. If your Karma drops too low, you may not get assigned to certain jobs anymore, or, in more extreme cases, you may be banned from the server.
infotexts.karmabanwarning: WARNING: Your karma is dangerously low. You will be banned from the server if it decreases further.
infotexts.karmabanned: You have been banned from the server because your Karma decreased below [banthreshold].
infotexts.karmajobdisallowed: You are not allowed to select this job because your Karma is too low ([yourkarma]/[minkarma]).
infotexts.karma.kickbanthresholdtooltip: The players whose karma decrease below this threshold get automatically kicked and/or banned from the server (depending on the kick/ban settings below).
infotexts.karma.karmadecaytooltip: How much karma decreases per second when it's above the decay threshold.
infotexts.karma.karmadecaythresholdtooltip: Karma gradually decreases when it's above this threshold.
infotexts.karma.karmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases per second when it's below the increase threshold.
infotexts.karma.karmaincreasethresholdtooltip: Karma gradually increases when it's below this threshold.
infotexts.karma.structurerepairkarmaincreasetoolti: How much karma increases when repairing structures (per amount of damage repaired—for example, a value of 0.05 would mean you get 5 points of karma when you repair a wall from 0 health to 100).
infotexts.karma.structuredamagekarmadecreasetoolti: How much karma decreases when damaging structures (per amount of damage done—for example, a value of 0.05 would mean that karma decreases by 5 when taking a wall from 100 health to 0).
infotexts.karma.itemrepairkarmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases when repairing devices (per amount of damage repaired—for example, a value of 0.05 would mean you get 5 points of karma when you repair a device from 0 health to 100).
infotexts.karma.damageenemykarmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases when damaging enemies (per amount of damage done).
infotexts.karma.healfriendlykarmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases when healing other members of the crew (per amount of damage healed).
infotexts.karma.damagefriendlykarmadecreasetooltip: How much karma decreases when damaging other members of the crew (per amount of damage done).
infotexts.karma.reactormeltdownkarmadecreasetoolti: How much karma decreases if the player causes a reactor meltdown.
infotexts.karma.reactoroverheatkarmadecreasetoolti: How much karma decreases per second if a reactor's temperature stays critical while the player is operating it.
infotexts.karma.extinguishfirekarmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases per second when attempting to extinguish fires.
infotexts.karma.allowedwiredisconnectionsperminute: How many wires a player is allowed to disconnect per minute before they start losing karma.
infotexts.karma.wiredisconnectionkarmadecreasetool: How much karma decreases if a player disconnects more than the allowed number of wires per minute.
infotexts.karma.spamfilterkarmadecreasetooltip: How much karma decreases if a player triggers the spam filter of the text chat.
infotexts.karma.herpesthresholdtooltip: How low does the karma have to decrease for the player to get space herpes.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.spaceherpes: The patient's face is covered with nasty-looking blisters and ulcers.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.invertcontrols: The patient's eyes are darting around and they seem to be having trouble orienting to their surroundings.
infotexts.karmakicked: You have been kicked from the server because your Karma decreased below [banthreshold].
infotexts.karma.kicksbeforeban: Number of kicks before a ban
infotexts.karma.kicksbeforebantooltip: If the player has been kicked from the server due to low karma this many times, they will be banned if their karma drops below the kick/ban threshold again. A value of 0 means players will always get banned if their karma drops below the threshold.
infotexts.karma.stunfriendlykarmadecreasetooltip: How much karma decreases based on how long an inflicted stun lasts.
infotexts.karma.stunfriendlykarmadecreasethreshold: How long the average stun in the past minute lasts until karma begins decreasing.
infotexts.karma.dangerousitemstealkarmadecreasetoo: How much karma decreases when stealing weapons and ID cards from unconscious or handcuffed players.
infotexts.karma.dangerousitemstealbotstooltip: Apply a karma penalty when stealing dangerous items from bots.
infotexts.karma.ballastflorakarmaincreasetooltip: How much karma increases when damaging ballast flora.
infotexts.campaigndisclaimertext:
Please note that Barotrauma is still in Early Access, and that many aspects of the game are incomplete and still being worked on.

The Campaign Mode in particular is still lacking in content we've planned for the full version, and may not yet be as enjoyable as the multiplayer. If you're interested in what's to come in future updates, click the Roadmap button below.

We recommend that you play at least one of the single-player tutorials before diving into the multiplayer or the Campaign Mode. Good luck, sailor!
infotexts.campaignroadmaptext:
- Explorable locations: As of now, the locations on the campaign map are essentially just menus where you can buy supplies and hire new crew members, but during the Early Access period they will become actual physical locations you can enter and explore.

- Expanded story: You will be able to learn more about the world of Barotrauma by interacting with NPCs and by exploring the outposts and non-man-made locations.

- New mission types: We have plans for several completely new mission types, including personnel transport missions and salvage missions into shipwrecks.

- Balancing: Currently the campaign economy is not very well balanced, but we will start to put more focus into it when we have more of the content in.

- End goal: At the moment it’s not possible to complete the campaign, but in future versions the mysterious location at the center of the map will become reachable...
infotexts.editordisclaimertext: The submarine and character editors are modding tools that can be used to expand the core game by creating your own submarines and monsters. The custom creations can be shared in the Steam Workshop.\n\nAt the moment the editors are only available in English. The process of building a fully playable submarine or a functional monster can be quite involved, and unfortunately we don’t offer in-game tutorials or documentation for the editors yet. If you want to take a shot at creating your own custom content with the editors, you may be able to find help through the following links:
infotexts.centerarealockedtext: This area is unreachable in this version of Barotrauma. Please wait for future updates!
infotexts.statisticspromptheader: Do you want to help us make Barotrauma better?
infotexts.statisticsprompttext: Do you allow Barotrauma to send usage statistics and error reports to the developers? The data is anonymous, does not contain any personal information and is only used to help us diagnose issues and improve Barotrauma.
infotexts.traitormissionstartmessage: You are the traitor! You have successfully infiltrated the submarine and now it's time to put the plans in motion.
infotexts.traitormissionfailuremessage: You have failed in your mission. As a result, the mission has been canceled and you are now part of the crew. Keep a low profile until you are contacted again.
infotexts.traitormissionsuccessmessage: You have successfully sabotaged the crew's efforts. An escape shuttle has been dispatched for you.
infotexts.traitorobjectivestartmessage: You have a new objective. The following goals need to be completed:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectivestartmessageserver: [traitorname] is the traitor and has the following goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagesuccess: [traitorname] was a traitor and succeeded in completing the given goals:\n [traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagesuccessdead: [traitorname] was a traitor and succeeded in completing the given goals but regrettably died in the process. Goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagesuccessdetaine: [traitorname] was a traitor and succeeded in completing the given goals but was detained. Goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagefailure: [traitorname] was a traitor but failed to complete the given goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagefailuredead: [traitorname] was a traitor but died while failing to complete the given goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectiveendmessagefailuredetaine: [traitorname] was a traitor but got detained while failing to complete the given goals:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorgoaltimelimitfailure: You failed to complete your objective in time.
infotexts.traitorgoaldestroyitems: Dispose of at least [percentage] percent of all non-inventory [tag] on the sub.
infotexts.traitorgoalfloodpercentofsub: Flood at least [percentage] percent of the submarine.
infotexts.traitorgoaljamsonarinfo: Hide an active sonar jammer somewhere it can't be found for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.traitorgoaljamsonarinfoalt: Jam the submarine's sonar for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.traitorgoalsabotageinfo: Sabotage the [target] so that its condition is under [threshold]%.
infotexts.traitorgoaltamperoxygeninfo: Swap at least [percentage] percent of oxygen tanks inside diving equipment with welding fuel.
infotexts.traitorgoaltampercoilguninfo: Load dummy ammunition into all coilgun loaders.
infotexts.traitorgoaltampercoilguninfomulti: Load dummy ammunition into [number] coilgun loaders.
infotexts.traitorgoaltamperrailguninfo: Load a dummy shell into all railgun loaders.
infotexts.traitorgoaltamperrailguninfomulti: Load [number] dummy shells into a railgun loader.
infotexts.traitorgoalfindcontainerinfo: Find your next objective inside a [target] in [targethullname].
infotexts.traitorgoaldestroyoxygen: Destroy at least [percentage] percent of all non-inventory oxygen tanks on the sub.
infotexts.traitorgoalsabotagedurationinfo: Sabotage the [tag] so that its condition is under [threshold]% for at least [duration] seconds.
infotexts.traitorgoalreachdistancefromsub: Reach distance of [distance] from the sub.
infotexts.traitorgoalwithdurationinfotext: [infotext] The goal must be completed for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.traitorgoalwithcumulativedurationinfotex: [infotext] The goal must be completed for a total of [duration] seconds.
infotexts.traitorgoalwaitfortraitorsinfotext: Wait for [remaining] of [count] traitors to complete their tasks.
infotexts.traitorgoalkilltargetinfowithhull: Assassinate [targetname] and leave the body in the [targethullname].
infotexts.traitorgoalkilltargetinfowithcauseandhul: Assassinate [targetname] by [causeofdeath] and leave the body in the [targethullname].
infotexts.mvptraitormissionstartinfotext: A voice within your head screams loudly enough to startle you: "THE CULT OF THE HUSK CALLS YOU TO SERVICE!"
infotexts.mvptraitorobjectivestartmessage1: An idea gradually forms in your mind, strangely seductive to you in spite of its mundane nature:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.mvp_goalinfotext_1: Search the storage lockers—a special message just for you is hidden under one of the spare oxygen tanks.
infotexts.mvpobjectivesuccessmessage1: As you somehow predicted, a slip of filthy paper is stuck to the underside of this oxygen tank. It's covered in primitive scribbles, but you intuitively understand it to be coded instructions.
infotexts.mvpobjectivesuccessmessage2: A rush of pleasure hits you like a wave as you complete the first task on the paper. A dry, mad laugh echoes within your head for a moment, fading into indistinct wet clicks.
infotexts.mvptraitorobjectivestartmessage3: You read the next coded instruction:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.mvpobjectivesuccessmessage3: With that, there is nothing more to do. The sub is in disarray, the voice in your head grows silent, and your fate is sealed.
infotexts.flood_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage1: It's time. As the man with the strange painted face instructed you back on the loading dock at Minos Linea, you get to work:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_1_goalinfotext_1: Search the emergency supplies lockers in each compartment. An operative has hidden a button component in one of them.
infotexts.flood_1_objectivesuccessmessage1: You quickly stash the button in your pocket and try to act casual. HONK!
infotexts.flood_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage2: Next, you'll need to find some explosives before anyone else can get to them!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_1_goalinfotext_2: Retrieve the explosives from the medbay.
infotexts.flood_1_objectivesuccessmessage2: The plan is coming together perfectly. You grab the explosives and try not to giggle too much.
infotexts.flood_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage3: Finally, the painted man said you'll need to find something to set this all off!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_1_goalinfotext_3: Search the steel storage cabinets around the sub and retrieve the detonator.
infotexts.flood_1_objectivesuccessmessage3: The operative really came through! You have all you need now to get the party here started.
infotexts.flood_1_traitorobjectivestartmessage4: You're going to need to set the detonator on a wall in a good location, place the button a safe distance away, wire the two together, then set it all off to flood this rust bucket!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_1_objectivesuccessmessage4: HONK HONK! There's more than enough water in the sub now to end its mission prematurely. You wonder how long it will take to swim to the nearest outpost and report back to the painted man...
infotexts.flood_2_traitormissionstartinfotext: Scanning furtively around, you notice nobody's looking at you—which makes this the perfect time to snap into action.
infotexts.flood_2_traitorobjectivestartmessage1: You've spent months gaining the trust of this crew, and it's all about to pay off:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_2_goalinfotext_1: Search the emergency supply cabinets around the sub. One of the diving masks has a small low-frequency receiver hidden in it, which you'll need in order to achieve your objectives.
infotexts.flood_2_objectivesuccessmessage1: You find the tiny radio receiver and activate it.
infotexts.flood_2_traitorobjectivestartmessage2: The receiver crackles and whistles as a weak signal is received: "Europan Resistance direct action, you are clear to go ahead with the mission: Start by creating a distraction."\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_2_objectivesuccessmessage2: Well done. Without oxygen, we'll have those pigs in a panic soon enough.
infotexts.flood_2_traitorobjectivestartmessage3: Now cause a little flood and watch the fascists squeal:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_2_objectivesuccessmessage3: Excellent! Remember comrade, there are no bad tactics, only bad targets!
infotexts.flood_2_traitorobjectivestartmessage4: Quickly, capitalize on the confusion and take out the worst of those pigs while you can!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.flood_2_objectivesuccessmessage4: As you take their life you note, perhaps with a little bitterness, that your receiver has gone dead quite suddenly. Your comrades have left you to the mercy of Mother Europa.
infotexts.goblins_traitormissionstartinfotext: As you hear scratching from below, it occurs to you it's been a while since the ballast goblins have been fed. As luck would have it, there's plenty of meat to go around.
infotexts.goblins_traitorobjectivestartmessage1: First, some seasonings. A well stocked kitchen has many options but for this purpose, only the purest cyanide will do.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.goblins_objectivesuccessmessage1: Ah yes, this will do nicely.
infotexts.goblins_traitorobjectivestartmessage2: Let's start the darlings off with some water.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.goblins_objectivesuccessmessage3: Look at that tender, succulent meat!
infotexts.goblins_objectivesuccessmessage4: Now the goblins are fed, but the pantry is empty. Time to pick up some more supplies at the next station.
infotexts.oxygen_sabotage_traitormissionstartinfot: Time for another experiment. This time we're testing how the human body reacts to being deprived of oxygen.
infotexts.oxygen_sabotage_traitorobjectivestartmes: Subjects have been gathered and we are ready to start.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.oxygen_sabotage_objectivesuccessmessage1: Subjects should start feeling the effects shortly. Symptoms for oxygen deprivation include, but aren't limited to: extremities turning blue, seizures and fainting.
infotexts.oxygen_sabotage_traitorobjectivestartmes: When you're happy with the data you've gathered, dispose of the test subjects.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.oxygen_sabotage_objectivesuccessmessage2: Another successful test. Report back to the nearest coalition outpost.
infotexts.acidparty_traitormissionstartinfotext: You find a manically scribbled note in your pocket. "Hey man. You know there's this thing in the center of the moon, right? What if there was, like, a way to see what it is without physically going in there?"
infotexts.acidparty_traitorobjectivestartmessage1: Step 1. Find some delimi- delirun- der- the thing that says "DEL," right? \n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.acidparty_objectivesuccessmessage1: This must be it. Never had this before.
infotexts.acidparty_traitorobjectivestartmessage2: Step 2. Sometimes subs carry these...these vision blockers, right? Basically what they do is, is they ground you and then you only see, like, a real narrow representation of reality, okay? So what you wanna do is you wanna get rid of those. They call them shits halleberrydil or some shit like that. \n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.acidparty_objectivesuccessmessage2: Looks like that's all of it.
infotexts.acidparty_traitorobjectivestartmessage3: Step 2. First rule is we gotta share. The thing here is that some people, right? Some people are kinda brainwashed into being afraid of anything that challenges their world view, you know? So you know, you gotta find a way to sneak that shit into their system, right? \n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.acidparty_objectivesuccessmessage3: This party sucks. I'm outta here.
infotexts.acidparty_objectivesuccessmessage3alt: This party is kind of a bummer. Let's turn it into an experience.
infotexts.tainted_welding_traitorobjectivestartmes: The receiver crackles and whistles as a weak signal is received: Europan Resistance direct action, you are clear to go ahead with the mission: This sub has to be sunk, and it has to look like an accident. Start by sabotaging the welding gear.\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.tainted_welding_goalinfotext_2: Swap the welding fuel for oxygen tanks in at least 70% of the sub's welding tools.
infotexts.tainted_welding_objectivesuccessmessage2: Well done. Oxygen tanks tend to burn when loaded in welding tools.
infotexts.tainted_welding_traitorobjectivestartmes: Now you'll need to dispose of that commandeered fuel so the crew can't put it to use later:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.tainted_welding_objectivesuccessmessage3: Well done! The crew is in a particularly vulnerable situation now without even knowing it.
infotexts.tainted_welding_objectivesuccessmessage4: Fine work, comrade! The pigs are surely doomed now.
infotexts.tainted_welding_traitorobjectivestartmes: Make your escape! A shuttle will be dispatched shortly to pick you up!\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.tainted_welding_objectivesuccessmessage5: The warning alarm on your diving suit sounds... The shuttle should have rendezvoused with you some time ago, but the only movements in the gloom are schools of alien organisms. You broadcast another transmission: "This is Europan Resistance direct action, come in! Requesting extraction!" The transmitter remains silent; you've been left to your fate. Europa embraces you.
infotexts.one_of_us_goalinfotext_2: Sacred vessels of the husk's young have been hidden behind a loose vent in [targethullname]. Find these eggs quickly before someone else stumbles upon them!
infotexts.one_of_us_objectivesuccessmessage2: A rush of pleasure hits you like a wave as you find the eggs. A dry, mad laugh echoes within your head for a moment, fading into indistinct wet clicks.
infotexts.one_of_us_objectivesuccessmessage3: Your head spins and your vision narrows as the last of the calyxanide is destroyed.
infotexts.one_of_us_goalinfotext_4: All on this sub must partake of communion with the husk!
infotexts.easterbunny_goalinfotext_1: Find a very special egg, possibly hidden in one of the vents.
infotexts.easterbunny_objectivesuccessmessage1: The egg disgusts you, but fits neatly in your pocket. HONK!
infotexts.easterbunny_goalinfotext_2: Find a safe place for the egg to grow, and feed it [catalystitem].
infotexts.easterbunny_objectivesuccessmessage2: The egg bulges and makes strange noises... You're about to become a parent!
infotexts.easterbunny_traitorobjectivestartmessage: The egg cracks and a mudraptor bursts forth:\n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.easterbunny_goalinfotext_3: See to it by any means that the mudraptor survives for at least 3 minutes.
infotexts.easterbunny_objectivesuccessmessage3: Honk honk! That was hilarious. The painted man's going to get a kick out of this when he hears how it went.
infotexts.traitormissionstartmessage_trap: It occurs to you that you promised to bring momma some famous Versas crawler liver. You can't come back empty-handed again. Time for some drastic measures.
infotexts.traitorobjectivemessage_trap1: Maybe one of the crew has some? But they don't like talking to you. Better make up a reason to talk to one of them privately. \n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorobjectivemessagesuccess_trap1: Oh, they must have meant the engine when they were talking about loose screws.
infotexts.traitorobjectivemessage_trap2: Someone ought to be coming to repair the engine soon. See if they have a liver on them. \n[traitorgoalinfos]
infotexts.traitorgoalinfos_trap2: Inspect the crew's livers. Find one that resembles a crawler's.
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.c1: 你差點被一位穿著艦長制服的人撞上。看得出來他心情很糟，也不是當地居民。他的腰間掛著一把左輪手槍，正低著頭與一群人滿臉疑惑地研讀一面地圖。他們對你說聲抱歉之後回頭繼續研究著他們的地圖。
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o1: “嘿，能讓我看一眼地圖嗎？你們知道離開這個鬼地方最快的航線嗎？”
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o1.c1: 他用手抓抓後腦勺，“那正好是我們在找的。離我們要去的地方還有一段長路要走，但是我們的物資不夠了，連返航都有問題。”
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o1.o1: “讓我瞧瞧，說不定我們要去的是同一個地方。”
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o1.o1.c1: 你們合作找到了一處通往下個哨站的捷徑，看起來有點危險，但哪裡不危險？最後你向那位艦長道別。
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o1.o1.c2: 儘管多了你的幫忙，你們還是沒有找到一條更好的航線。你只能向他們道別並祈禱他們的運氣能夠變好。
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o2: 試著在他們不注意的時候偷走手槍。
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o2.c1: 你一聲不響地解放了他槍套中的手槍並收進自己的口袋裡。Your heart skips a beat when the captain turns toward you, but they only give you a quick glance and continue pacing back and forth. You decide it’s best to put some distance between the two of you.
infotexts.eventtext.givingdirections.o2.c2: 正當你要提起手槍時，那位艦長突然轉身。你們四目相交，他們睜大他們的目光注視著正在發生的一切。他們伸手拿槍。
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.c1: You hear a strange scraping sound coming from a nearby vent. Curious, you peer through the slats of the vent cover, but it’s far too dark in there to see anything... A moment later you hear the sound again, you’re sure of it!
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o1: Unscrew the vent cover to take a better look inside.
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o1.c1: You manage to get the vent off easily enough and spot the source of the noise right away: The fan blade is brushing against a small metal box. Carefully retrieving it, you open it and find 1,000 marks!
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o1.c2: You fumble the vent cover as you’re removing it and brush against the spinning blade. It slices into your hand before you can pull away, nicking an artery.
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o2: Shine your flashlight through the vent slats and see if you can spot anything unusual.
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o2.c1: An enraged mudraptor bursts from the vent!
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o2.c2: Three enraged mudraptors burst from the vent!
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o3.c1: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o3.c2: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out!
infotexts.eventtext.soundinthevent.o3.c3: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.c1: A nearby research terminal draws your attention. It flickers on and off rapidly for a while, then goes dark.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.c1: You try pressing a couple buttons. No response. Opening a side panel reveals a tangle of wires and some kind of a processing unit seemingly in perfect condition.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o1.c1: You quickly unscrew the parts that look the most useful, carefully place them in your pocket and then put the panel back.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o1.c2: Whoever put this thing together did a poor job. You deem it impossible to salvage anything without taking the whole thing apart. While you’re elbow deep in the wiring, you hear footsteps approach. Panicking, you yank some wires out and slam the panel back in its place.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o2.c1: You jiggle some display cables and the terminal comes back to life. Poking around the system reveals some opportunities. Looks like it’s connected to the outpost’s outfitting service. What do you want to do?
After clicking around a bit, you successfully order two boxes of coilgun ammunition for your vessel, free of charge.
This is what they have insurance for, right?
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o2.o2: Install an old-school first-person shooter on the system.
You carry on the age-old tradition of installing the game on any platform possible. This accomplishes nothing except to give you a good feeling as you chuckle to yourself.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o2.c2: You try turning the terminal off and on again. Nothing. Now what? That’s the only thing you were taught to do and it usually solves the problem. Frustrated, you jiggle some wires behind the terminal when you feel a sharp pain shoot up your arm, along with a shower of sparks. You decide that’s enough injury for now.
infotexts.eventtext.impromptuengineering.o1.o3: Back away. There have to be some nerds around here who get paid to fix these things.
infotexts.eventtext.clownrelations1.c1: Someone has left a toolbox in the middle of the hallway.
