infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor1.o1.c1: “Just me and Rex. We're supposed to visit nana in the next town over, but for some reason nobody wants us on board.” The person can't keep eye contact for more than a second and keeps glancing over their shoulder.
infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor1.o1.o1.c1: There are always vessels traveling these waters, eager to make some extra moolah by taking on passengers. You open your mouth, trying to voice your suspicions about the situation. “Wh-”, you start, but the person interrupts you. “I'll pay you three thousand. One when we leave, two when we get there.”
infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor1.great: “Great!”, they exclaim. “I'll get Rex and we'll meet you on board!” What a happy fellow. Hopefully their money is good.
infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor2.c1: You're inspecting the sub when the person you talked to at the station peeks out from a cabin, with a wide smile on their face. “You ready to meet Rex?” Before you can utter a response, the biggest mudraptor you've ever seen jumps out behind them.
infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor2.o1.c1: You yell out and reach for a weapon, but the creature only tilts its head and looks at you quizzically. “Isn't he a cutie?” This is Rex? They brought a mudraptor on board? “Be careful, though. Rex gets ornery on long trips. Don't you, boy? Yes you do!” Great.
infotexts.EventText.manandhisraptor2.c1.c1: Rex is pacing back and forth.
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.c1: As you approach, this bandit throws down their weapon. “Ah fuck it, I give up. Don't shoot!”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.o1: “Too late for that. Say your prayers.”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.o1.c1: The bandit reaches for their weapon on the ground. “Do your worst!”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.o2.c1: “Thanks for not offing me, I guess.” The bandit squats down and wipes sweat off his brow. “I've never fired that, you know”, he says, pointing to the gun on the floor. “Not cut out for this shit.”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.wait: “Wait!” The bandit cries out and jumps to their feet. “Can I come with you? I know a lot about chemistry. I could cook you meds!”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.signingbonus: “All right! We can sort out a signing bonus later.”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.whatamigonnado: “Well what am I gonna do then? Wait 'till another sub comes through guns blazing?”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.o2.o2.c1: “I was captured along with the rest of my crew and sub. They're all gone now.” They scowl. “Eaten. They were used as bait for the crawlers that used to inhabit this place. I was spared because I know how to make morphine and fent.”
infotexts.EventText.heartofgold.o2.o2.o1.c1: “Give me a break. Like you haven't done any opiates yourself? The way I see it I provided a service and, in return, nobody pointed a gun my way.” A dry smile creeps on their face. “Until you, that is.”
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.c1: The guard takes a long look at you. “Nevermind. I thought you looked like someone else. You're free to go.”
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.c1: “Just be careful”, the guard cautions. “We received a bomb threat a few hours ago, by some usual suspects. It's been a while and no bomb has been found, but we advise caution.”
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1: The guard lowers their voice. “Look, you better stay clear of this separatist business. There have been some serious attacks lately. Just come to me if you see something suspicious.”
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1.c1: Out of the corner of your eye, you see a pile of scrap electronics.
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.c1: To your surprise, the pile of scrap turns out to be a homemade pipe bomb. As luck would have it some wires have come loose, preventing the bomb from going off. You carefully remove the detonator, pick up the bomb and place it in your bag. The guard from earlier should be interested in seeing this.
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.c1.c1: You thrust the bomb to the arms of the guard, who flinches a bit. You recount your experience and the guard thanks you for finding the bomb and gives you a small reward for dismantling it.
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.c2: To your surprise, the pile of scrap is wired to a timer. You turn it around and see “00:01” displayed on the timer.
infotexts.EventText.bombscare.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.o1.c1: You drop the bomb and dive down onto the floor, covering your head with your hands. Seconds pass by, but nothing happens. Gingerly, you stand up and dust yourself off. Seems like this bomb is a dud. The guard from earlier should be interested in seeing this.
You report finding a bomb in the hallway and the guard immediately springs to action. They thank you for finding and reporting the bomb.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.c1: You see a person crouched next to a vending machine, assembling or fixing something.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1: Find out what they're working on.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1.c1: You sneak behind the person and crane your neck. It seems they're fiddling with some kind of a device with lots of wires. They glance back and jump up when they see you. “Shit! Don't just stand there!”
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1.o1.c1: “It's all right, I guess.” They check their pulse and exhale deeply. “I've been a wreck ever since my medication was pulled. Couldn't afford it, they said. Then they went ahead and installed these fuckin' things.” Irate, the dweller kicks the vending machine.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.excuse: “I, uh...” Their eyes dart around, looking for something. “I'm building a, um...” They're sweating profusely.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.shh: “SHHH! Not so loud!”, they hiss. Then they continue, whispering. “Yes, it's a bomb. But it's also so much more. It's a symbol of discontent against our overlords. We must topple the monuments of oppression, like this one here.” They spit on the vending machine. “But that's hypothetical at this point, 'cause I don't actually know how to arm this symbol.”
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.novice: The novice terrorist scrutinizes you for a minute, then warily hands you a bunch of wires. “I think I can trust you”, they say.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.bombarmed: It's only a matter of connecting the detonator wire to get the bomb armed. You hand the bomb to the person and they give you some change and a promise to talk you up to their Separatist friends.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.bombdismantled: You pretend to arm the bomb, but instead you remove some of the wires, making sure the bomb can't go off. The person hands you some change as a reward and promises to talk you up to their Separatist friends.
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1.o1.o1.o1.o2: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1.o1.o2: “Sorry to hear that. See you later.”
infotexts.EventText.terrorism101.o1.o2.o1.o2: “Keep it that way. Terrorism is no way of life.”
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.c1: This colony is in a hurry. Lots of workers are loading supplies onto submarines. You see a pair of them arguing quietly and gesturing towards you.
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.o1.c1: On your approach, the pair instantly quiets down. Up close you can see an anarchist patch on one of their jackets, revealing them to be separatists. “Didn't you help us out earlier?”, the other asks.
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.o1.o1.c1: “You see all that crew running around? A lot of subs here are readying for a dive.”
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.o1.o1.o1.c1: “Yeah, so do we. We sent one of ours to the office to find out.” The speaker shifts their weight and pauses for a bit. “They haven't come back yet, and I'm getting worried. Might've been caught doing something they shouldn't have.”
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.o1.o1.o1.o1.c: “Not a bad idea. Officials here don't know you yet. Just sneak in, see what you can see. Whatever it is, don't cause a scene.”
infotexts.EventText.stuckinthemiddle.o1.o1.o1.o1.o: “Oh, and if our guy ask you if you've had Versas liver, the answer is “It's to die for.””
Peeking into a side room, you see somebody sitting on a chair, handcuffed. Judging by their bloody and swollen face, they've been roughed up pretty thoroughly.
The person is semi-delirious, but they manage to mutter a question: “You ever- ever had V-versas liver?”
“S-shame. I hear it's to die for.” They chuckle to themselves. “You better leave before s-security comes back. If you could let somebody know I'm in here, it'd be s-swell.”
You inform the separatists of the location of their agent. They thank you for your help and set out to rescue their comrade.
“Take th-the scrap of paper from my pocket. M-make s-sure it makes it to safe hands. I better stay here or the pigs smell something's going on.” You take the paper and stuff it in your pocket.

You hand the intel to the separatist. “Damn. This isn't much to go on. The only thing this proves is that the Coalition has started mobilizing en masse and they're searching for something. I could've told you that by just looking around. Thanks for your help anyway. If you'll excuse me, we have a rescue mission to undertake.”
infotexts.EventText.censorship.c1: “Hey, psst!” You hear a sharp whisper from behind. A person in a clown costume is trying to get your attention.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1: Listen to what they have to say.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.c1: They seem grateful that you're willing to hear them out, but under all that white makeup, you can't be sure. The person is really fidgety and every time they shift, their shoes squeak loudly.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.c1: You manage to gather that a shipment of important materials has been falsely impounded from this clown person's vessel and they're asking for help getting it back.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1: The jester is overjoyed. The box has been taken to the manager's office. They toot a horn as you turn to leave. Weird.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.c1: There is a box of supplies here, labeled “Confiscated”. This must be what the clown wanted. You bend down and pick up the box, then turn around to head back when you see a security guard pointing at you with a stun baton. “Where do you think you're going? That's confiscated materials you're carrying.”
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.c1: You explain that you're helping someone get their unlawfully confiscated cargo back. “Unlawfully? Do you realize you're carrying highly dangerous implements of terror there?” The guard carefully opens the box, revealing a bunch of red and white costumes and an assortment of bike horns.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.o1.c: The guard takes the box from you. “Don't let me catch you trying that shit again.”
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.o1.o2.c: Without saying another word, you turn tail and run. The officer is stunned for a moment, then chases after you.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.o2.c1: You explain that you are a new customs officer here and are transporting the box to a more secure facility.
infotexts.EventText.censorship.o1.o1.o1.c1.o2.o1.c: The guard decides it's not worth their time to fact-check what you said. They wave you to continue on.
The clown is happy to see their items back and teaches you a customary clown greeting that you can use to impress other clowns.
The guard is not convinced and takes the box from you.
Sadly, you return to the clown empty-handed.
infotexts.missiondescription.stowawayescort1: 有偷渡客偷偷摸地上船了，將他們送到能讓他們回家的地方。
infotexts.missionmessage0.stowawayescort1: 偷渡客已經死亡，任務失敗。
infotexts.missionsuccess.stowawayescort1: 任務成功，偷渡客將能夠找到回家的路。
infotexts.missionfailure.stowawayescort1: 並未將偷渡客送達至目的地。
infotexts.missionsuccess.gotosubra: 你抵達了[location1]，找到Jacov Subra並將他繩之以法。
infotexts.missiondescription.subraescort: 運送危險的罪犯Jacov Subra至附近的哨站。
infotexts.missionsuccess.subraescort: 任務成功，已將Jacov Subra交給當局。
infotexts.missionfailure.subraescort: 並未將犯人送達至目的地。
infotexts.missiondescription.badvibrationsartifact: [location1]的居民回報在探索附近一處遺跡後腦袋中感受到一股奇怪的震動，探索這個異星遺蹟並找出引發這個症狀的原因。
infotexts.missionmessage0.badvibrationsartifactrui: 異星文物已被帶回船上，駕駛潛艇離開這裡以領取獎勵。
infotexts.missiondescription.raptorescort: 運送乘客與他們的夥伴至附近的哨站。
infotexts.missionsuccess.raptorescort: 任務成功，乘客與他們危險的夥伴安全地下船了。
infotexts.missionfailure.raptorescort: 並未將乘客送達至目的地。
infotexts.resetingamehintstooltip: Are you sure you want to reset in-game hints? This will allow the game to show you hints that you've previously set to not be shown again.
infotexts.entitydescription.piratehelmet: A pirate-customized ballistic helmet. Despite the crude improvements made to it, the helmet seems surprisingly sturdy.
A set of body armor, partially fashioned out of improvised materials by the pirates. It's heavier than it looks.
infotexts.entitydescription.chaingunammoboxphysico: A backbreakingly heavy box of ammunition for the chaingun, utilizing Physicorium as its main material. These rounds have enough stopping power to occasionally stun any foe they hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.pulselaserammoboxtrila: A box of containing a special concoction of chemicals and rare materials. The lens used splits the laser in three, allowing the laser to hit multiple targets at once.
infotexts.itemassemblyvanillafileexistswarning: There's already a vanilla item assembly with the same name. Overwriting vanilla files is not allowed, please choose another name.
infotexts.entitydescription.pirateclothes: A rugged outfit hand-crafted by the pirates, designed to endure the harsh conditions of seabound life on Europa. This specific outfit has been improved with light armor plating.
infotexts.maxmissioncounttooltip: 每回能能夠選取的最多任務數量。
infotexts.entitydescription.unidentifiedgeneticmat: A mass of alien genetic material. Use a research station to identify the material and to process it into something that can be inserted into a gene splicer.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmudrapt: Causes the subject to grow a mudraptor-like beak.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmoloch: Increases resistance to physical damage by [value]%
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialthreshe: Decreases the subject's oxygen consumption by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmantis: Increases movement speed on land by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialhammerh: Allows the subject to to do [value]% more damage with melee weapons.
Makes the subject's physical injuries heal at a rate of [value]% per minute.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialspineli: Causes the subject to grow spineling-like bony protrusions out of their back.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialhusk: Prevents husk infections from advancing to the point where the parasite takes control of the host.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmollusc: Receiving physical damage makes the subject gain [value]% vigor.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialskitter: Receiving physical damage makes the subject gain [value]% hyperactivity.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialhunter: Receiving physical damage makes the subject gain a [value]% boost to melee weapon damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.genesplicer: A device used to splice alien genes into a human. Equip the splicer in the health interface and insert genetic materials in the splicer to activate the genes. Once spliced onto a living subject, genetic material cannot be removed without destroying it.
infotexts.entitydescription.advancedgenesplicer: A more advanced form of the gene splicer, capable of activating two types of genetic materials at the same time.
infotexts.researchstation.empty.infotext: No material inserted. Insert genetic material.
infotexts.researchstation.refine.infotext: Genetic material detected. Ready to refine. Caution: [taintedprobability]% risk of contamination.
infotexts.researchstation.refine.missingitem: Insufficient material. Insert more genetic material to refine.
infotexts.researchstation.combine.infotext: Unstable combination of materials detected. Proceed with caution.
infotexts.entitydescription.gravitysphere: Generates a strong, artificial gravity field.
infotexts.talentname.handsomestranger: Once Upon a Time on Europa
infotexts.talentdescription.tumble: Whenever you ragdoll for at least [seconds] seconds, your attacks with pistols are [damage]% more powerful for the next [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.quickdraw: If it has been longer than [seconds] seconds since you've attacked with a pistol, your next attack with a pistol is [damage]% more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.evasivemaneuvers: Whenever your submarine takes damage from a monster, gain a bonus of [helmbonus] to the Helm skill for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.bountyhunter: Whenever you or an allied crewmember kills a monster, your crew gains additional marks equal to [percentage]% of the creature's maximum health.
infotexts.talentdescription.trustedcaptain: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a Coalition Commendation.\nWhen you apply a Coalition Commendation on another character, gain [selfxpgain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.esteemedcaptain: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain a Coalition Medal.\nWhen you apply a Coalition Medal on another character, gain [selfxpgain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.downwiththeship: If you are on your submarine and it becomes at least [flooded]% flooded, you gain an additional [swimmingboost]% swimming speed and a bonus of [skillboost] to Mechanical and Electrical skills for [duration] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.camaraderie: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, and your crew contains at least [jobcount] different jobs, your crew gains an additional [extramoney]% money and experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.drunkensailor: Gain [dmgresistance]% physical damage resistance and [stunresistance]% stun resistance while drunk.\nWhen you play a Harmonica, a random ally on your current submarine has a [skillgainprobability]% chance to gain a random skill point every second.
infotexts.talentdescription.trucker: Whenever you finish all your selected missions, gain an additional Coalition Commendation.
infotexts.talentdescription.trustbuilding: Whenever you finish a mission, your crew gains an additional [smallgain]% maximum health, and if all crewmembers survived, your crew gains an additional [largegain]% maximum health instead, up to a maximum of [maxgain]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.bythebook: Whenever you finish at least one mission, your crew gains an additional [moneyamount] marks and [experienceamount] experience for each captured, live enemy human on board your ship, up to a maximum of [moneyamountmax] marks and [experienceamountmax] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.bootcamp: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, you gain an additional [amount]% experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.tandemfire: As long as you are manning a turret alongside another allied crewmember, both of your attacks are [amount]% more powerful. Only the closest allied crewmember gains this effect.
infotexts.talentdescription.munitionsexpertise: Whenever you fabricate SMG ammo, shotgun ammo or stun gun ammo, you have a [probability]% chance to gain twice as much output.
infotexts.talentdescription.multitasker: Whenever you gain a skill point, if it’s not for the same skill as the last skill point gained, gain an additional skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.apprenticeship: Whenever another allied character gains a skill point, you have a [probability]% chance to also gain a skill point in that skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.buccaneer: Aiming with a melee weapon before attacking adds up to [amount]% power to your next melee attack.
infotexts.talentdescription.extraskillfromcrafting: Gain [amount]% more [skillname] skill from fabricating items.
infotexts.talentdescription.scavenger: Whenever you open a container outside your submarine for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding additional items.
infotexts.talentdescription.payextra.cargoandescor: You are paid an additional [extra]% for cargo and escort missions.
infotexts.talentdescription.simultaneousskillgain: Whenever you gain [skillname1] skill, also gain [skillname2] skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasereputationgain: Your crew's reputation gains are improved by [value]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.chanceofextraweapondam: Whenever you attack with any weapon, your attack has a [probability]% chance of becoming twice as powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.extrapowertoharpoons: Gain an additional [value]% attack power to harpoons.
infotexts.talentdescription.extrapowertoharpoonsin: If you are in the open sea, gain an additional [value]% attack power to harpoons instead.
infotexts.talentdescription.dropalienmaterialonkil: When you kill a monster while outside your submarine, it has a [probability]% chance of having an additional alien material.
infotexts.talentdescription.warriorpoet: You can write a book.\nTo do this, ragdoll yourself. After [seconds] seconds, you will gain the item [itemname] and [moneyamount] marks for each enemy you've killed since your last book (as royalties).
infotexts.talentdescription.dualspecops: When you ragdoll in water, propel yourself forward in your current direction.
infotexts.talentdescription.beatcop: You can tackle other characters by ragdolling into them at high speeds.
infotexts.talentdescription.truepotential: Clown Power allows you to hit characters with a Toy Hammer for a [probability]% chance to implode them.
infotexts.talentdescription.stonewall: Whenever you are attacked, gain an additional [physicaldamagereduction]% physical damage resistance and [stunresistance]% stun resistance for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.richinknowledge: Whenever you gain a skill point, gain an additional [experienceamount] experience, while your allied crewmembers gain [alliedexperienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.olympian: You gain an additional percentage to the following attributes equal to [skillpercentage] of the total average of all your skills:
infotexts.talentdescription.playingcatchup: If you are [levelvalue] or more levels behind your most highest-leveled crewmember, gain an additional [experiencevalue]% mission experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.skedaddle: Move [value]% faster. When you are attacked, this bonus is increased to [attackedvalue]% for [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.insurancepolicy: Whenever you die from non-friendly sources during a mission, your crew is paid [amount] marks for each mission you've completed since the last time you've died.
infotexts.talentdescription.feigndeath: Enemies will ignore you if you have been ragdolled for longer than [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.stillkicking: Whenever you fall unconscious, revive a short while later and remove all afflictions.
infotexts.talentdescription.crewlayabout: Allies near you repair [repairspeed]% faster and gain a bonus of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.graduationceremony: Upon creating a new character, retain all of your current experience for that new character.
infotexts.talentdescription.enrollintoclowncollege: As long as you are wearing a full clown outfit, you gain Clown Power.
infotexts.talentdescription.clownpowerdamagereduct: Clown Power gives you an additional [physicalresistance]% physical damage resistance.
infotexts.talentdescription.waterprankster: Clown Power gives you immunity to pressure and allows you to swim [swimspeedvalue]% faster.
infotexts.talentdescription.inspiringtunes: Clown Power allows you to honk your horn to repair nearby electrical and mechanical items, and nearby allies to gain a bonus of [skillamount] to all skills for a short while.
infotexts.talentdescription.psychoclown: Clown Power allows you to attack faster with melee weapons based on how much Psychosis you have, up to [maxattackspeed]%, but you cannot run while having Psychosis.
infotexts.talentdescription.slapstickexpert: Clown Power allows you to have a small chance to trip randomly when you run.\nWhile ragdolled, Clown Power allows you to reduce the power of incoming attacks by [powerreduction]%, and characters that attack you have a [probability]% chance of becoming stunned for [stunseconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.commando: When firing a ranged weapon while crouched, gain [armorpenetration]% additional armor penetration, and your attacks are [powerincrease]% more powerful, but your firing rate is [firingratedecrease]% slower.\nRecover from bleeding much more quickly.
infotexts.talentdescription.phdinnuclearphysics: Your attacks with crowbars are [powerincrease]% more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.intheflow: Whenever you fully repair a device, repair [repairspeed]% faster for the next [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.coauthor: You can co-write a book with a Mechanic.\nTo do this, select their character and have them select yours. After [seconds] seconds, you will gain [itemname], and both of you gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.polymath: Gain a bonus of [skillincrease] to all skills, and you gain [experiencegain]% more mission experience, but you have [maximumhealthreduction]% less maximum health.
infotexts.talentdescription.optimizedpowerflow: Gain an additional percentage to Turret Power Cost Reduction and Turret Charge Speed equal to [statamount]% of your Electrical skill.\nWhenever you fully repair an item, gain a bonus of [skillamount] to Electrical.
infotexts.talentdescription.aggressiveengineering: When you attack with a wrench, you have a [probability]% chance to attack with [powerincrease]% additional power and inflict an additional stun.
infotexts.talentdescription.pyromaniac: When you inflict burning damage on an enemy, gain [physicaldamagereduction]% physical damage resistance for [seconds] seconds.\nInflict [burnincrease]% more burning damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.scrapsavant: You can refine [scrapamount] scrap to any alien material.\nGain [experienceamount] experience when you fabricate an alien material.
infotexts.talentdescription.scrounger: When you deconstruct scrap, gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.elbowgrease: Gain an additional percentage to Melee Power and Maximum Health equal to [statamount]% of your Mechanical skill.\nWhenever you deconstruct scrap, gain a bonus of [skillamount] to Mechanical.
infotexts.talentdescription.miner: Whenever you deconstruct an ore, you have a [probability]% chance to gain double the output.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.pump: You can tinker with a pump, increasing its pumping rate by [speedincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.engine: You can tinker with an engine, increasing its torque by [speedincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.loader: You can tinker with a loader, increasing the connected turret's firing rate and damage by [damageincrease]%, while lowering its power usage by [powercostreduction]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.tutorial: You can use a wrench to tinker with devices.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.cooldownreducti: The cooldown period of tinkering is reduced to [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.durationincreas: You can tinker for an additional [seconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.suppliespower: Non-turret devices you tinker with will always function as if they had power.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.reminder: The device is only affected for as long as you keep tinkering with it.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.duration: You can tinker for [duration] seconds. After you have tinkered with a device, you cannot tinker for [cooldown] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.overclocking: Tinkering with items damages them, but the effects of tinkering are increased by [tinkerincrease]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.fieldmedic: Every [seconds] seconds, if your allied crewmembers are at [healththreshold]% health or higher, gain [skillincrease] point in Medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.curiosity: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact you gain [experiencegain] experience, and your crew gains [crewexperiencegain] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.reverseengineer: Whenever you deconstruct an alien artifact, gain double output from it and gain [skillgain] to a random skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.alienhoarder: Your attacks with alien pistols have [powerincrease]% additional power for each alien artifact you are carrying, up to an additional [maxpowerincrease]% power.
infotexts.talentdescription.doubleduty: As long as you are outside your sub, take [physicaldamagedecrease]% less physical damage. As long as you are inside your submarine, gain a bonus of [skillincrease] to Medicine.
infotexts.talentdescription.firemanscarry: You can drag characters at full speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.researchersintuition: Whenever you open an alien container for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding additional items.\nWhile you are holding a large alien artifact, gain an additional [swimmingspeed]% Swimming Speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.commander: Whenever you give an order to another character, apply Inspiration to that character, giving them [physicalresistance]% physical damage resistance and a bonus of [skillincrease] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.commanderreminder: Giving an order to a new character removes the effect from the last character.
infotexts.talentdescription.additionalinspirationb: In addition to other Inspiration bonuses, the ordered character also gains the following attributes:
infotexts.talentdescription.allhandsondeck: You may bestow an additional character with Inspiration effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.atmosmachine: When you deconstruct an alien artifact, there is a [probability]% chance it will instead transform into a random alien item.\nWhenever you finish a mission, your crew gains [experienceamount]% additional mission experience for each large alien artifact on board your ship, up to [maxexperienceamount]%.
infotexts.talentdescription.navydiver: Attacks you suffer are [attackpowerreduction]% less powerful while you are in water.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityrepair: Welding tools and plasma cutters you fabricate are [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityweapon: Weapons you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitybatter: Batteries you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityfuelro: Fuel rods you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitytools: Tools you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualitytanks: Fuel and oxygen tanks you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.crafthighqualityexplos: Explosives you fabricate are of [qualitybonus] higher quality.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainitemsonmission: Whenever you finish at least one mission, gain the following items as an additional reward:
infotexts.talentdescription.extramission: You may select an additional mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.lowhealth.effectivehea: When you are below [health]% health, normal damage types are healed [extraheal]% more effectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.lowhealth.regenerate: When you are below [health]% health, normal damage types slowly heal by themselves.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainstructurerepairspe: Repair hulls [amount]% faster with welding tools.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainstructurecutterdam: Deal [amount]% more damage to structures with cutters.
infotexts.talentdescription.findadditionalscrap: Whenever you open a container in a wreck for the first time, you have a [probability]% chance of finding an additional scrap.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmarksonskillpoint: Gain [amount] marks when you gain a skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainskillspastmax: You can gain skills past their ordinary maximum.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainbonustoallskills: Gain a bonus of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.reductiontoallskills: Suffer a reduction of [amount] to all skills.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasemaxrepairmecha: You can repair mechanical devices [percentage]% past their normal maximum condition.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialrefineb: Refining genetic materials improves their potency by [amount]% more.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialtainted: Combining different types of genetic materials is [amount]% less likely to taint the materials.
infotexts.talentdescription.bedsidemanner: Whenever you apply medicine to a friendly character, they gain [physicaldamageresistance] physical damage resistance and an additional [skillgainincrease]% skill gain, the total duration depending on your medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.electrochemist: If you have not been attacked for [seconds] seconds, the next attack you suffer has [powerreduction]% less power and your attacker is stunned for [stunseconds] seconds.
infotexts.talentdescription.drsubmarine: Using medical items while crouched also applies [selfinflictpercentage]% of the effects on you as well.
infotexts.talentdescription.combatmedic: Gain an additional percentage to Movement Speed, Ranged Fire Rate and Melee Attack Speed equal to [skillpercentage]% of your medical skill.
infotexts.talentdescription.geneharvester: When you or another crewmember kills a monster while outside your submarine, you have a [probability]% chance of finding a random genetic material on it.
infotexts.talentdescription.researchgrant: Whenever you refine or combine genetic items, gain [marks] marks.
infotexts.talentdescription.melodicrespite: When you play a guitar, you and allies near you gain the following attributes for up to [seconds] seconds:
infotexts.talentdescription.expandedresearch: Whenever you fabricate depleted fuel or a fuel rod, gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.hazardousmaterials: Whenever you loot a reactor in a wreck for the first time, you will find rare materials.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainskillatlowskill: When you gain a skill point for a skill that has a total lower than [skilltotal], gain an additional skill point.
infotexts.talentdescription.advancedsplicing: Whenever you or another allied crewmember combines or refines genetic materials, gain [experienceamount] experience and a bonus of [skillbonus] to medical.
infotexts.talentdescription.increasemaxrepairelect: As long as your electrical skill is [skilltotal] or higher, you can repair electrical devices [percentage]% past their maximum condition.
infotexts.talentdescription.letitdrainreminder: You can only install a maximum of [itemcount] of this item on your submarine.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannedheat: Whenever you play an accordion, the ally nearest to you will gain [allyexperienceamount] experience every second. When they do, you gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.nuclearoption: When you fabricate a fuel rod, gain triple output.
infotexts.talentdescription.quickfix: Whenever you fully repair a device, gain [experienceamount] experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggeruntilmission: This effect can only occur up to [maxtrigger] times until you finish another mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.singletriggeruntilmiss: This effect cannot occur again until you finish another mission.
infotexts.talentdescription.increaseattackpowertom: Your attacks are [attackpowerincrease]% more powerful against monsters inside your submarine.
infotexts.talentdescription.cannotfallunconscious: You will remain fully conscious even after falling below 0 health.
infotexts.talentdescription.extramarksonnewstation: Your crew gains an additional [marks] marks whenever you reach a new station.
infotexts.talentdescription.bonuseslostondeath: These bonuses are lost on death.
infotexts.talentdescription.bonuslostondeath: This bonus is lost on death.
infotexts.talentdescription.assistantsdontcount: The deaths of assistants do not count.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainitemonfinishmissio: Whenever you finish a mission without a crewmember dying, gain the item [item]
infotexts.talentdescription.maximumhealthperlevel: Gain an additional [maximumhealth]% maximum health for each of your levels.
infotexts.talentdescription.gainalltalentsintree: Gain all the talents in this talent tree.
infotexts.talentdescription.dontdieonme: The CPR you apply is much more powerful.
infotexts.talentdescription.healabovehealth: As long as you are above [percentage]% health, normal damage types slowly heal by themselves.
infotexts.entitydescription.pressurestabilizer: A special drug that gives the user an immunity to pressure and removes their need for oxygen for a short duration.
infotexts.entitydescription.endocrinebooster: This medical contraption, when used, bestows the user with permanent performance enhancement.
infotexts.campaignoption.enablehardcore.tooltip: A challenge for expert sailors. Difficulty is increased. Characters gain more experience, but all character progress is lost on death.
infotexts.entitydescription.slipsuit: A modified Combat Diving Suit with additional diving fins that aid the user when moving in water. Sadly, the fins also make it difficult to walk on solid ground.
infotexts.entitydescription.bandolier: A light combat rig, capable of carrying ammunition and other useful items. Thanks to improved ergonomics, increases combat effectiveness with ranged weapons and turrets.
infotexts.entitydescription.repairpack: A handheld contraption, capable of quickly correcting mechanical and electrical problems. Consumed on use.
infotexts.entitydescription.autoinjectorheadset: A modifed headset utilizing an integrated battery, capable of injecting medicine placed within once the user's vitals drop to a certain level.
infotexts.entitydescription.depletedfuel: A heavy, hard material derived from processing a spent fuel rod. Can be further fabricated into tools and munitions.
infotexts.entitydescription.wrenchhardened: A wrench that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthened material allows for more efficient repairs and heavier swings.
infotexts.entitydescription.screwdriverhardened: A screwdriver that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthened material allows for more efficient repairs and heavier swings.
infotexts.entitydescription.crowbarhardened: A crowbar that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthened material makes it easier to pry open doors and bash open heads.
infotexts.entitydescription.divingknifehardened: A diving knife that has gone through a process of hardening using depleted fuel. The strengthened material allows for deeper slashes and stabs.
infotexts.entitydescription.revolverrounddepletedf: A .38 round for the revolver, fashioned out of depleted fuel. Along with increased penetration, the ammo has been special-made to also inflict radiation sickness on the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.smgmagazinedepletedfue: A .45 caliber magazine for the SMG, containing rounds of depleted fuel ammo. Along with increased penetration, the ammo has been special-made to also inflict radiation sickness on the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxdepleted: A heavy box of depleted fuel ammunition for the coilgun. Along with increased penetration, the ammo has been special-made to also inflict radiation sickness on the target.
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldelectricalmoni: A small handheld device that gives the user remote access to information regarding the ship's electrical systems.
infotexts.entitydescription.handheldstatusmonitor: A small handheld device with a screen displaying the current status of the ship, informing the user of any breaches remotely.
infotexts.entitydescription.autoshotgun: A roughly engineered automatic shotgun with a vast ammo capacity. Its size and heft makes it a bit cumbersome to lug around.
infotexts.entitydescription.handcannon: A humongous beast of a revolver, designed to better deal with the large alien threats on Europa than typical firearms.
infotexts.entitydescription.handcannonround: An exceedingly large .61 revolver round. The unique alloy of materials allows for high penetration and stopping power.
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitioncommendation: A small medal fashioned out of copper by the Coalition. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with a sum of experience.
infotexts.entitydescription.coalitionmedal: A small medal fashioned out of bronze by the Coalition. Much like a Coalition Commendation, it bestows another crewmember with experience, except in greater amounts.
infotexts.entitydescription.assaultrifle: An assault rifle chambering 6.8mm cartridges. Though banned by the Coalition, the schematics for these rifles are still passed around Europa as they present a premier option for submarine defense, or as the Separatists would prefer, societal revolution.
infotexts.entitydescription.assaultriflemagazine: A magazine designed for holding 6.8mm cartridges.
infotexts.entitydescription.shotgunslugexplosive: A shotgun slug containing explosive material. Powerful, but still somewhat inaccurate on account of being fired out of a shotgun.
infotexts.entitydescription.skillbooksailorsguide: A small handbook that covers all the tasks associated with underwater sailing, though in limited scope.
infotexts.entitydescription.skillbooksubmarinewarf: A small handbook with useful information pertaining to all things submarine warfare, with detailed pictures of elaborate tactical manuevers and proper firearms discipline.
infotexts.entitydescription.skillbookhandyseaman: A small handbook containing detailed information on the most-often-encountered technical problems on board the submarines of Europa, with simple-to-understand instructions for dealing with them.
infotexts.entitydescription.skillbookeuropanmedici: A small handbook seeking to educate its reader on the proper conduct with treating the wounded and the sick using limited medical resources. The word "triage" appears to be mentioned a lot.
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalgoggles: A thermal imaging device that makes it easier to distinguish living targets in poor lighting conditions, even through solid obstacles.
infotexts.entitydescription.reactorpda: A handheld device that can be used to remotely control the submarine's reactor.
infotexts.entitydescription.dirtybomb: An explosive compound mixed with highly radioactive material. Though the explosive payload is low, the ensuing fallout will catastrophically irradiate the area.
infotexts.entitydescription.fulguriumfuelrodvolati: A Fulgurium fuel rod that has been further refined to supply power for much longer than normal. However, its radiation shielding can only partially limit the emitted ambient radiation, so the rod must be handled with care.
infotexts.entitydescription.nucleargun: A prototype energy weapon built using the unique alien materials on Europa. The weapon induces a type of fission reaction at the end of the barrel, and releases it in a powerful beam once it is too violent to contain.
infotexts.entitydescription.cargoscooter: An underwater scooter special-made to transport material underwater. While the scooter is too large to be stored in one's inventory, its inherent buoyancy means the scooter will stay where you leave it.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingmask: A clown mask combined with a diving mask, allowing the user to both clown around and breathe underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.safetyharness: A special harness made to reduce workplace related injuries incurred on Europan submarines. The harness also dampens the effects of rushing water, stabilizing the user in the event of a hull breach.
infotexts.entitydescription.pucs: 通用危機保護裝 (Protective Universal Crisis Suit)，簡稱PUCS，能夠賦予其使用者對輻射和火災等環境危害的強大抵抗力。其搭載的空氣過濾系統讓這套潛水服能夠在狀況許可時直接利用船艙內的氧氣，同時它所搭載的電腦也能對使用者注射任何置於其中的藥物。
infotexts.entitydescription.cigar: A submariner's life is mentally taxing, but perhaps this exquisitely crafted cigar can help you soothe your nerves a bit.
infotexts.entitydescription.stungundartfulgurium: 一種非常有效的電擊麻醉槍彈藥，可以麻醉那些潛在的匪徒讓他們癱軟成一坨爛泥。
infotexts.entitydescription.fixfoamgrenade: 會釋放出一團化學止漏劑用以快速停止洩漏。
infotexts.entitydescription.portablepump: 一個使用乾電池的小型抽水機，他的抽水速度飛快但也非常耗電，能夠安裝在牆上。
infotexts.entitydescription.dementonitetool: 以尚未完全被理解的異星材料攝魂礦石製成。拿著它時會感受到一股奇妙的不安。
infotexts.itemmsgtotalnumberlimited: 這項物品已在這艘潛艇中放置過多
infotexts.orderdialog.dismissed.repairsystems: [name]，謝謝你幫忙維修損壞的設備！
[name]，謝謝你幫忙處理損壞的設備！
infotexts.entitydescription.alienterminal: 會在放入對應物品後發出訊號。
infotexts.entitydescription.artifacttransportcase: 一個用來減輕運送異星文物麻煩的箱子。
infotexts.entitydescription.RuinWallCorner1: 一面帶有碰撞的異星遺跡普通牆壁。
infotexts.entitydescription.ruinscanner: 一個用來以聲納探測遺跡的裝置。
infotexts.entitydescription.ruinvent: 一個可能會釋放有害氣體或孢子的通風口。
infotexts.eventtext.missionevent_scanruin.c1: “來自科學部門的請求，附近有一處遺蹟需要探勘，當然我們會提供獎勵的。”
infotexts.missiondescription.scanruin: 為了進一步他們的研究，一些在[location1]科學家們請求你幫忙掃描附近的異星遺蹟。對遺蹟展開探索並使用提供的掃描器掃描被標記的空間。
infotexts.missionsuccess.scanruin: 以掃描異星遺蹟且將資料送達。
infotexts.missionfailure.scanruin: 異星遺蹟未被掃描，對研究人員來說它們依舊是個謎。
infotexts.missionmessage0.scanruin: 已掃描異星遺蹟，將資料運送至[location2]。
infotexts.eventtext.missionevent_clearruin.c1: “我們正在對附近的遺蹟展開研究，但守衛者們阻擾著我們的進度，能否請你幫我們除掉它們？”
infotexts.missiondescription.clearruin: 消滅[location1]附近的異星遺蹟中的守衛者與它們的保護艙。
infotexts.missionmessage0.clearruin: 已清除遺蹟中的所有守衛者。駕駛潛艇離開這裡以領取獎勵。
infotexts.missionsuccess.clearruin: 已清除遺蹟中的所有守衛者。
infotexts.missiontypedescription.abandonedoutpost: 消滅佔領了廢棄哨站的兇猛生物、不法分子、或從中營救人質。
infotexts.missiontypedescription.clearalienruins: 清除異星遺蹟中的守衛者。
infotexts.missiontypedescription.scanalienruins: 在異星遺跡中放置掃描器以收集它們的數據。
infotexts.dialoglastoxygentank: 正在使用最後一罐氧氣。
看來這是我最後一罐氧氣了。
infotexts.orderoptions.pumpwater: 向外抽水, 向內抽水, 停止抽水
infotexts.talentdescription.honkinggivesskillgain: 小丑之賦予你以鳴響自行車喇叭使周遭隊友一段時間內獲得[skillgainincrease]%的技能加成的能力。
infotexts.talentdescription.honkinghealscharacters: 小丑之賦予你以鳴響鳴響自行車喇叭緩慢治療周遭隊友的能力。
infotexts.talentdescription.standanddeliver: 每當你完成至少一項任務，都會獲得一份"水手指南"。\n當你使用"水手指南"時，提升周遭隊友所有技能[skillamount]點。
infotexts.statisticsconsenttext:
歡迎來到《潛淵症》！在預設情況下，我們不會收集您的遊戲資訊。如果您希望保持這個設置，請點擊“否”。

如果您點擊“是”並給與了我們收集您遊戲中資訊的許可權，我們將可以使用您的遊戲資訊來改善和優化《潛淵症》。我們將收集的遊戲資訊詳情如下。我們將儲存您的確認和SteamID雜湊值並送到我們的資料庫，但您的遊戲資訊在我們的開發過程中將是匿名的。

我們將使用GameAnalytics Ltd.的服務，並遵守他們的規章。這意味著如果您對我們授權使用您的遊戲資訊，也就必須同意GameAnalytics使用您資料進行品質管制與分析。

您可以隨時在遊戲設置中修改是否收集您的遊戲資訊。詳情請參考‖color:255,255,255,255‖https://gameanalytics.com/privacy/‖end‖

我們的隱私條例：
infotexts.statisticsconsentstatement: 我同意開發者有權收集、存儲和處理我的個人資料，並與GameAnalytics Ltd.分享這些資料，用於品質管制和分析目的。
infotexts.gameanalyticsstatus.error: GameAnalytics 由於發生錯誤無法執行。
infotexts.upgradedescription.increasemaxcondition: 提升設備的耐久度，降低它們劣化的速度並使它們能夠承受更多損害。
infotexts.karma.dangerousitemcontainkarmadecreaset: 當裝填危險物品，例如將氧氣罐放進焊接工具裡時卡瑪降低的量。
infotexts.karma.isdangerousitemcontainkarmadecreas: 裝填危險物品的懲罰倍率
啟用時，卡瑪降低的量將乘上玩家裝填危險物品的次數。
infotexts.karma.maxdangerousitemcontainkarmadecrea: 裝填危險物品懲罰最大值
裝填危險物品受到的最大卡瑪懲罰。
infotexts.pausemenusaveandreturntoserverlobbyverif: 你確定要保存並返回伺服器大廳嗎？
infotexts.pausemenusaveandreturntomainmenuverifica: 你確定要保存並返回主選單嗎？
infotexts.clicktowriteservermessage: 點選以輸入一段伺服器訊息
infotexts.submarine.description.orca2: 經典的逆戟鯨系列的繼承者，這艘潛艇擁有相同的三壓艙裝置，能夠極速進行上浮和下沉。作為一艘偵察船Orca 2裝備精良，除了歐羅巴最危險的怪物外，其他對手都難從它這裡討到好處。
infotexts.undefinedsubmarineselected: 未定義種類的潛艇無法在戰役中使用！
infotexts.nohashsubmarineselected: 這艘潛艇缺少有效的hash值；你可能需要等待它從伺服器下載完成！
infotexts.dialogcombatnoweapons: 我沒有能用於自衛的武器！
infotexts.orderoptions.loaditems: 替乾電池充電, 填充氧氣罐, 裝填彈藥
infotexts.orderdialog.loaditems.turretammo: [name]，確保潛艇武器彈藥不會用盡！
infotexts.talentdescription.cannotfallunconsciousf: 當你的生命值低於0，你依舊能夠保持清醒，且你的攻擊力將提升[powerincrease]%並持續[seconds]秒。
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmedicalskillformis: 每當你完成一個任務，如果所有船員都倖存，則獲得[skillincrease]醫療技能點。
infotexts.talentdescription.gainoutputandskillfrom: 拆解異星文物時你將有[probability]%幾率得到兩倍材料並隨機給予[largeartifactskill]經驗給一項技能。拆解小型異星文物時則將給予[smallartifactskill]經驗。
infotexts.talentdescription.gainexperiencefromarti: 拆解異星文物時你和另一名隨機船員將獲得[experiencegain]經驗。拆解小型異星文物時則將給予[smallexperiencegain]經驗。
infotexts.talentdescription.maxtriggeruntildeath: 這項效果每回合每條命只能觸發一次。
infotexts.talentdescription.maxskillfromtalent: 這項天賦最多只能增加額外的[skillamount]經驗。
infotexts.experiencetooltip: 經驗主要透過完成任務獲得。\n在高難度地區完成任務將獲得更多經驗。
infotexts.talentdescription.expertcommando: 在蹲下時開火將減少[spreadreduction]%的子彈分散程度、且提升[powerincrease]%攻擊力，但你的射擊速度降低[firingratedecrease]%。\n你將更快的從流血狀態恢復。
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmedicalitemeffecti: 你使用的醫療物品效果提升[amount]%。
infotexts.talentdescription.geneticmaterialrefinef: 精煉基因材料將使它們的效果額外提升[amount]%。
infotexts.talentdescription.stillkickingheal: 當你的生命值低於0，短時間內快速治療普通類型傷害，並消除暈眩。
當你的生命值低於0，短時間內快速治療普通類型傷害，並消除暈眩。
infotexts.talentdescription.medicaleffectiveness: 使用在你身上的醫療物品效果提升[amount]%。
infotexts.talentdescription.payextra.monsterandnes: 討伐怪物與清理巢穴的任務報酬額外增加[extra]%。
infotexts.talentdescription.gainmissionxpanditem: 當你在沒有船員死亡的狀態下完成任務時獲得額外[amount]%經驗以及[item]。
infotexts.talentdescription.depletedfueldeconstruc: 當你或你的隊友拆解耗乏燃料時獲得[amount]經驗。
infotexts.talentdescription.gaindoubleskillatskill: 當你的[skillname1]技能為[skilltotal]或者更高時，獲得兩倍的[skillname2]技能。
infotexts.dialogcannotfindloadable: 我找不到可以放到容器裡的東西！
infotexts.dialogcannotfindloadable.batterycells: 我找不到需要充電的電池！
我找不到需要充電的東西！
infotexts.dialogcannotfindloadable.oxygentanks: 我找不到需要填充的氧氣罐！
我找不到需要填充的罐子！
infotexts.dialogcannotfindloadable.turretammo: 我找不到潛艇武器所需的彈藥！
我找不到任何彈藥進行裝填！
infotexts.editor.undounavailable: 配線模式下無法查看復原歷史。
infotexts.talentdescription.tinker.fabricatorandde: You can tinker with a fabricator or a deconstructor, increasing their operating rate by [speedincrease]%.\nYou can tinker with fabricators and deconstructors indefinitely.
infotexts.talentdescription.crisismanagement: 潛艇裡的水愈滿，你在維修和游泳的速度就愈快，最高可獲得額外的[statamount1]%修復速度和[statamount2]%游泳速度。
infotexts.entitydescription.boardingaxe: 一把手斧，需用雙手揮舞。
infotexts.entitydescription.supercapacitor: 能夠瞬間輸出巨大的能量，但容量比蓄電池要低得多。為超級電容充電也需要使用比蓄電池所需更多的能量。
infotexts.label.letwaterdrain: 請將水先排空後再離開！
infotexts.itemmsgrequiretraining: 放置此物品需要受過特殊訓練。
infotexts.entitydescription.combatstimulantsyringe: 一種高度先進的興奮劑，能迅速治癒使用者的身體傷害和失血。
infotexts.editor.layer.tooltip: 切換、建立、刪除、和重命名群組。
infotexts.medicalclinic.requesttimeout: 伺服器沒有回應，請再試一次。
infotexts.medicalclinic.insufficientfunds: 你沒有足夠的馬克來支付此費用。
infotexts.medicalclinic.healrefused: 由於哨站正有事故發生，站上的醫務人員忙得無法幫助你的船員。
infotexts.orderdialogself.loaditems.turretammo: 我來裝填潛艇武器的彈藥。
infotexts.submarine.description.barsuk: 野獾級潛艇是新手船長的最愛。它使用被摧毀潛艇的回收材料（反正很多都是野獾）製造使該系列的價格低廉。多年來圍繞著定制和調整該原型的船隻，甚至形成了野獾級愛好者亞文化圈。
infotexts.submarine.description.winterhalter: 禦冬級潛艇最初是由新伊阿佩特斯的超鋼船廠製造的，只生產了一年就被聯盟收購用於研究目的。許多現存的型號都配備有船載研究室，而且武裝到了牙齒。
infotexts.submarine.description.herja: 憑藉其多樣的武器裝備，女武神潛艇可以處理與各種歐羅巴洲居民的衝突，是聯盟艦隊中的中流砥柱。如果附近有怪物的巢穴被清除，那麼很有可能就是女武神的功勞。
infotexts.missiondescription.killcrawlerbroodmothe: 有報告指出，一隻特別巨大且富有敵意的爬行者正在威脅[location1]和[location2]之間旅行的船隻。任何能夠消滅牠的人都將得到[reward]馬克的獎勵。
infotexts.missionmessage0.killcrawlerbroodmother1: 爬行者巢母已被消滅。駕駛潛艇離開這裡以領取獎勵。
infotexts.missiondescription.killgiantspineling1: 有報告指出，一隻特別巨大且富有敵意的脊刺正在威脅[location1]和[location2]之間旅行的船隻。任何能夠消滅牠的人都將得到[reward]馬克的獎勵。
infotexts.missionmessage0.killgiantspineling1: 巨型脊刺已被消滅。駕駛潛艇離開這裡以領取獎勵。
infotexts.missiondescription.killmudraptors1: 一群泥偶迅猛龍正在威脅[location1]和[location2]之間旅行的船隻。任何能夠消滅牠的人都將得到[reward]馬克的獎勵。
infotexts.missionmessage0.killmudraptors1: 泥偶迅猛龍已被消滅。駕駛潛艇離開這裡以領取獎勵。
